original: dngos po nye bar ston pa la ni ma rig pa'i byed pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po nye bar ston pa la ni ma rig pa'i byed pa med do //
translated: But in the teaching of an entity, there is no activity of ignorance.

original: de ni med pa ston par nus pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni med pa ston par nus pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the characteristic of being able to teach non-existence.

original: des na der dngos por 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa btsal bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na der dngos por 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa btsal bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, there must be a connection with an entity there.

original: de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de ni mi bden te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: der yang rig pa'i byed pa rtog pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang rig pa'i byed pa rtog pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no contradiction in the activity of awareness in that regard.

original: ji ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis shes pas mi bden pa nye bar ston pa de kho na bzhin du rig pa'i dbang gis mi bden pa ma yin pa yang nye bar ston par 'gyur bas na 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: ji ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis shes pas mi bden pa nye bar ston pa de kho na bzhin du rig pa'i dbang gis mi bden pa ma yin pa yang nye bar ston par 'gyur bas na 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Just as it is through the power of ignorance that awareness teaches non-reality, in the same way, through the power of awareness, it would teach non-non-reality. Therefore, this is mere quibbling.

original: des na gtan tshigs ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not unestablished.

original: mi bden pa 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir dpe sgrub byed kyis stong pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mi bden pa 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir dpe sgrub byed kyis stong pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The example is devoid of the probandum because non-reality is not a result.

original: 'o na myu gu res 'ga' dmigs par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na myu gu res 'ga' dmigs par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How then could the sprout be observed intermittently?

original: dmigs par res 'ga' ba yin gyi de ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs par res 'ga' ba yin gyi de ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is the observation that is intermittent, not the sprout.

original: bde ba la sogs pa la yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa la yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: The same would apply to pleasure and so on.

original: dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are the nature of observation.

original: de dag kho na res 'ga' ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kho na res 'ga' ba yin no zhe na /
translated: They themselves are intermittent.🔽The sprout and so on are also like that.

original: myu gu la sogs pa yang de lta bu yin mod khyed dmigs pa yang gang la 'dod /
analyzed: myu gu la sogs pa yang de lta bu yin mod khyed dmigs pa yang gang la 'dod /
translated: What do you assert to be observation?

original: gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin ngo bo yin /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i rang bzhin ngo bo yin /
translated: If you say that the nature of an entity is its essence,

original: de res 'ga' ba yin pas na 'di res 'ga' ba ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de res 'ga' ba yin pas na 'di res 'ga' ba ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: since that is intermittent, how could it not be intermittent?

original: bde ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that pleasure and so on are,

original: ji ltar de'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar de'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: how could they be its observation?

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no relation.

original: de ni myu gu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin la /🔽rgyu yang ma yin 'bras bu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni myu gu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin la / rgyu yang ma yin 'bras bu yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of the sprout,🔽nor is it its cause or its effect.

original: rgyu gcig pa yang ma yin rnam pa gzhan gyi 'brel pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa yang ma yin rnam pa gzhan gyi 'brel pa yang ma yin la /
translated: It is not a single cause, nor is it a relation of another type.

original: 'brel pa med pa yang de'i dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa yang de'i dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor is that which is unrelated to it the object of that.

original: des na de rang nyid kyang res 'ga' ba ma yin zhing de'i dmigs pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: des na de rang nyid kyang res 'ga' ba ma yin zhing de'i dmigs pa yang ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, if it is not itself sometimes, and its object is not sometimes,

original: ji ltar res 'ga' dmigs par 'gyur /🔽des na de nyid res @51a * //
analyzed: ji ltar res 'ga' dmigs par 'gyur / des na de nyid res @51a * //
translated: how could it sometimes have an object?

original: 'ga' ba yin no zhes mi 'dod kyang khas blang dgos so //
analyzed: 'ga' ba yin no zhes mi 'dod kyang khas blang dgos so //
translated: Therefore, even though you do not accept that it is sometimes, you must accept it.

original: res 'ga' ba yin yang gal te mi bden pa 'bras bu ma yin na /
analyzed: res 'ga' ba yin yang gal te mi bden pa 'bras bu ma yin na /
translated: If, although it is sometimes, that which is not true is not the effect,

original: 'o na bde ba la sogs pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na bde ba la sogs pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then pleasure, etc., also would not be.

original: brdzun pa yang brdzun pa'i rgyur grub pa na chos mthun pa'i dpe grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: brdzun pa yang brdzun pa'i rgyur grub pa na chos mthun pa'i dpe grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Since a false thing is established as the cause of a false thing, the example that has a similar property is established. Therefore, this reason is not contradictory.

original: don dam pa nyid la ni don dam pa'i rgyu can nyid kyis khyab la /
analyzed: don dam pa nyid la ni don dam pa'i rgyu can nyid kyis khyab la /
translated: In reality, reality is pervaded by having a cause that is real.

original: de yang gtan tshigs 'di dag 'gal bas na /
analyzed: de yang gtan tshigs 'di dag 'gal bas na /
translated: Moreover, since these reasons are contradictory,

original: 'gal ba dmigs pas mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa na ma nges pa nyid kyang ga la yin /
analyzed: 'gal ba dmigs pas mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa na ma nges pa nyid kyang ga la yin /
translated: how could there be uncertainty when the contradictory is excluded?

original: 'dis ni mi bden pa'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu can gyi kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni mi bden pa'i 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu can gyi kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the foundation consciousness, which is the cause of the non-veridical engaging consciousness.

original: de ltar na shes pa rnam pa med pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rang bzhin med par sgrub la /
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa rnam pa med pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis rang bzhin med par sgrub la /
translated: Thus, the non-objective consciousness is established as non-existent by the natural argument of intrinsic reality.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa yin pas na cha la ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa ni khyab byed mi dmigs pa yin pas na cha la ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: And since the objective one is the non-apprehension of the pervasion, it is not unestablished with regard to a part.

original: gzhi yod na gtan tshigs 'grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhi yod na gtan tshigs 'grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the establishment of the argument dependent on the existence of a basis?

original: gtan tshigs 'di la ni rnam par shes pa gzhi yin la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di la ni rnam par shes pa gzhi yin la /
translated: In this argument, consciousness is the basis.

original: de yang med pas na gzhi ma grub pas ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yang med pas na gzhi ma grub pas ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But since that does not exist, it is unestablished because the basis is not established.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: dngos po'i chos ni gzhi dngos por gyur pa med na mi 'grub pa yin gyi dngos po'i chos kyis dben pa de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ni gzhi dngos por gyur pa med na mi 'grub pa yin gyi dngos po'i chos kyis dben pa de ni ma yin no //
translated: The property of an entity is not established without a basis that is an entity, but it is not that it is devoid of the property of an entity.

original: 'dir ni dngos po'i chos gcig dang du ma med pa gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod la /
analyzed: 'dir ni dngos po'i chos gcig dang du ma med pa gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod la /
translated: Here, the property of an entity, the non-existence of one and many, is asserted to be the very argument.

original: dngos po med pa la gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo mi 'thad pas na ji ltar ma grub pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa la gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo mi 'thad pas na ji ltar ma grub pa yin /
translated: Since the nature of oneness and manyness is untenable for a non-thing, how could it be established?

original: dngos po'i chos dang bral ba'i chos can dngos por gyur pa ma yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: dngos po'i chos dang bral ba'i chos can dngos por gyur pa ma yin par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not tenable that a subject that is devoid of the qualities of a thing is a thing,

original: med pa ni gzhi la sogs par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa ni gzhi la sogs par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not tenable that a non-thing is a basis and so on.

original: med pa la gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin ma grub pa rab tu mi 'grub ce na /
analyzed: med pa la gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin ma grub pa rab tu mi 'grub ce na /
translated: If the nature of oneness and manyness is not established for a non-thing, it is not established.

original: de ci da ni /
analyzed: de ci da ni /
translated: What is that?

original: rang bzhin grub pa rab tu 'grub bam /
analyzed: rang bzhin grub pa rab tu 'grub bam /
translated: Is the establishment of a nature established?

original: ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say they are not,🔽

original: 'o na de dag ma grub pa grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na de dag ma grub pa grub pa yin te /
translated: Well then, it is established that they are not established.

original: gal te de las ldog med na //
analyzed: gal te de las ldog med na //
translated: If it is not reversed,

original: gtan tshigs 'jug par 'dod dam ci //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'jug par 'dod dam ci //
translated: is it asserted that the reason engages?

original: de yang min na 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: de yang min na 'di nyid ni //
translated: If that is not so,🔽this is a negation. Why is the reversal negated?

original: dgag yin ldog pa ci ste 'gog / ldog pa med pa sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: dgag yin ldog pa ci ste 'gog / ldog pa med pa sgrub pa yin //
translated: The non-reversal is an establishment.

original: dngos med la yang yod yin la //
analyzed: dngos med la yang yod yin la //
translated: Even for a non-thing, there is existence.

original: dngos po yod pa yod min zhes //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa yod min zhes //
translated: The existence of an existent thing does not exist.

original: blun po yi ni spyod la ltos //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: blun po yi ni spyod la ltos //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: Look at the conduct of the foolish!

original: gzhan yang khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pas shes pa med @51b par nges pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pas shes pa med @51b par nges pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the nonexistence of consciousness is ascertained by the inference produced from the reason of the nonapprehension of the omnipresent.

original: de nges pa na gzhi ma grub pa zhes bya ba sgrub byed kyis sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nges pa na gzhi ma grub pa zhes bya ba sgrub byed kyis sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
translated: When that is ascertained, it is not the case that the reason is refuted by the proof called “nonestablishment of the basis.”

original: gal te de'i 'dod pa sgrub pa'i rgyu yin pa 'gog na de sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de'i 'dod pa sgrub pa'i rgyu yin pa 'gog na de sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: If one refutes the cause of the establishment of that, then that is the refutation.

original: de grub na sgrub byed dam pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de grub na sgrub byed dam pa yin pas na /
translated: If that is established, then it is the best proof,

original: de la sun 'byin pa med do //
analyzed: de la sun 'byin pa med do //
translated: so there is no refutation of that.

original: rjes su dpag pa skye ba'i sngon du ni med par grub pa mi srid de tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa skye ba'i sngon du ni med par grub pa mi srid de tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Prior to the production of the inference, the nonexistence of consciousness is not possible, because there is no valid cognition.

original: yod na yang khyab byed mi dmigs pa don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod na yang khyab byed mi dmigs pa don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if it existed, it would be pointless to apprehend the nonapprehension of the omnipresent.

original: mngon sum ni 'dir skabs ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa'i yang rtags med pa'i phyir dang / rtags la yang skabs kyi nyes pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ni 'dir skabs ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa'i yang rtags med pa'i phyir dang / rtags la yang skabs kyi nyes pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Direct perception is not relevant here, because there is no reason for inference, and the reason is also subject to the same objection.

original: 'o na yod pa dang med pa'i the tshom za ba'i chos can la khyab byed mi dmigs pa 'jug go zhes khas blang dgos la /
analyzed: 'o na yod pa dang med pa'i the tshom za ba'i chos can la khyab byed mi dmigs pa 'jug go zhes khas blang dgos la /
translated: But then you must accept that the nonobservation of a pervader applies to a subject about which there is doubt as to whether it exists or not.

original: de lta na yang gzhi la the tshom za ba nyid kyis sgrub byed ma grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhi la the tshom za ba nyid kyis sgrub byed ma grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then because there is doubt about the basis, the proof is not established.

original: mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi 'gyur te /
translated: That is not so,

original: chos can gyi ngo bo la the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can gyi ngo bo la the tshom med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no doubt about the nature of the subject.

original: shes pas ma yin pa la sogs pa las log pa'i ngo bo'i sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa chos can yin na de la the tshom mi za zhing /
analyzed: shes pas ma yin pa la sogs pa las log pa'i ngo bo'i sngon po la sogs pa'i shes pa chos can yin na de la the tshom mi za zhing /
translated: If the subject is the consciousness of blue, etc., which is the opposite of nonconsciousness, etc., then there is no doubt about it.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi'i chos la the tshom za bas ni chos can la the tshom za ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi'i chos la the tshom za bas ni chos can la the tshom za ba ma yin te /
translated: But doubt about the property of the subject of the debate does not constitute doubt about the subject,

original: de thams cad du mtshungs pas na rtags thams cad rtags ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thams cad du mtshungs pas na rtags thams cad rtags ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is the same in all cases, and it follows that no evidence is evidence.

original: yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba na shes pa nyid la sogs pa la yang the tshom za ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med par the tshom za ba na shes pa nyid la sogs pa la yang the tshom za ba ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If there is doubt as to whether something exists or not, it is not reasonable to doubt consciousness, etc.

original: de ldog pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽dmigs pa dang bral ba tsam sgrub byed yin pa'i phyir dang / de yang dmigs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ldog pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro // dmigs pa dang bral ba tsam sgrub byed yin pa'i phyir dang / de yang dmigs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is different from that.🔽The mere absence of an object is the proof, and that is also nonexistent.

original: gtan tshigs rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa nyid de zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa nyid de zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the reason is not established.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i sgrub byed tshad ma ni mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i sgrub byed tshad ma ni mi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The valid cognition that proves the emptiness of the nature of one and many is nonapprehension.

original: 'dis ni skad cig ma ma yin pa la rim dang rim ma yin pa mi dmigs pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni skad cig ma ma yin pa la rim dang rim ma yin pa mi dmigs pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains the nonapprehension of order and disorder in the nonmomentary.

original: der yang rtog pa'i bzo bos sbyar ba don dam par med pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa kho na chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang rtog pa'i bzo bos sbyar ba don dam par med pa'i skad cig ma ma yin pa kho na chos can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There, the nonmomentary, which is not ultimately existent, is the subject, as constructed by the creator of the fiction.

original: sgro btags pa yod pa 'gog na dngos po yod pa ma bkag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgro btags pa yod pa 'gog na dngos po yod pa ma bkag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the existence of the superimposition is refuted, the existence of the thing is not refuted.

original: 'o na ji ltar dgag ste /🔽yod pa la ni dgag pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar dgag ste / yod pa la ni dgag pa zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin la /
translated: How is it refuted?🔽There is no such thing as the refutation of the existent.

original: yod pa ma yin pa yang dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa yang dngos po ma yin no //
translated: And the nonexistent is not a thing.

original: yod pa nyid 'ga' zhig tu 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa nyid 'ga' zhig tu 'gog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that you refute some sort of existence,
what is it?

original: gang na gang yod pa de nyid de 'gog gam 'on te gzhan du yin /
analyzed: gang na gang yod pa de nyid de 'gog gam 'on te gzhan du yin /
translated: Is it the existence of something in a certain place that you refute, or is it something else?

original: de la der ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la der ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the existence of something in a certain place,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is contradictory.

original: gzhan du yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it something else,

original: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a nonentity.

original: de lta na gang du 'gog ste /🔽yod pa rnams la dgag pa med //
analyzed: de lta na gang du 'gog ste / yod pa rnams la dgag pa med //
translated: In that case, what is it that you refute?🔽There is no refutation of what exists.

original: de ni med pa'ang yod ma yin //
analyzed: de ni med pa'ang yod ma yin //
translated: Nor is there a refutation of what does not exist.

original: rigs pa 'di yis 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: rigs pa 'di yis 'gro ba yi //
translated: By this reasoning,

original: dgag pa'i don ni med par 'gyur //
analyzed: dgag pa'i don ni med par 'gyur //
translated: the object of refutation is nonexistent.

original: gal te yul dus 'gog ce na //
analyzed: gal te yul dus 'gog ce na //
translated: If you say that you refute a place and time,

original: ji ltar de yod de ltar ni //🔽mi 'gog ji ltar de med pa //
analyzed: ji ltar de yod de ltar ni // mi 'gog ji ltar de med pa //
translated: then just as it exists,🔽it is not refuted;🔽and just as it does not exist,

original: de ltar yang ni 'gog mi 'gyur //🔽zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ni 'gog mi 'gyur // zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: it is not refuted.

original: ji ste gzhan kho nar sgro btags nas 'gog na /
analyzed: ji ste gzhan kho nar sgro btags nas 'gog na /
translated: If you say that you refute something else that is superimposed,

original: 'o na sgro btags pa 'gog pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na sgro btags pa 'gog pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: then you refute a superimposition, but not an existent thing.

original: de lta na yang 'di sbrul med do zhes bya bas sgro btags pa'i sbrul 'gog pa na mi 'jigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'di sbrul med do zhes bya bas sgro btags pa'i sbrul 'gog pa na mi 'jigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But even so, when one says, “There is no snake here,” and thereby refutes the snake that is imagined, one does not become fearless.

original: gang gi phyir sgro btags pa'i sbrul la ni 'jigs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgro btags pa'i sbrul la ni 'jigs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: For it is not the imagined snake that causes fear,

original: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi las yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi las yin no //
translated: but the external one.

original: ji ste phyi rol gyi sbrul mthong ba ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: ji ste phyi rol gyi sbrul mthong ba ma yin mod kyi /
translated: If one does not see the external snake,

original: 'on kyang sgro btags pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang sgro btags pa yin te /
translated: then it is imagined.

original: des na de bkag pa kho na phyi rol gyi bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de bkag pa kho na phyi rol gyi bkag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere refutation of that is the refutation of the external one.

original: skad cig ma ma yin pa 'gog pa la yang tshul 'di yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin pa 'gog pa la yang tshul 'di yin te /
translated: The same method applies to the refutation of nonmomentariness.

original: mi bden pa la brnag pas chog go //
analyzed: mi bden pa la brnag pas chog go //
translated: It is enough to refute the unreal.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar khyab byed mi dmigs pa ma grub pa ma yin no zhes gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar khyab byed mi dmigs pa ma grub pa ma yin no zhes gnas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the nonestablishment of the nonobservation of the pervader is not tenable.

original: 'gal ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there contradiction,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists in the similar class.

original: bsgrub bya las bzlog pas khyab pa ni 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya las bzlog pas khyab pa ni 'gal ba yin la /
translated: The pervasion by the opposite of the probandum is contradiction.

original: de ni des khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni des khyab pa yin no //
translated: But that is pervaded by it.

original: gang zhig 'gar yang gang med na med pa ni bzlog pa la med pa na 'di mthun pa'i phyogs la snang bas na 'di 'gal bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zhig 'gar yang gang med na med pa ni bzlog pa la med pa na 'di mthun pa'i phyogs la snang bas na 'di 'gal bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If something is absent wherever something else is absent, then it is present wherever the latter is present. How can this be contradictory?

original: 'o na chos la gnod pa'i 'gal ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na chos la gnod pa'i 'gal ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t this a contradiction that undermines the property of the subject?

original: bsgrub bya'i chos ni ji ltar rang dang 'gal bas 'gog pa de bzhin du chos can la gnod pas kyang yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos ni ji ltar rang dang 'gal bas 'gog pa de bzhin du chos can la gnod pas kyang yin no //
translated: Just as the property to be proven is refuted by its contradiction, in the same way, it is also undermined by undermining the subject.

original: gtan tshigs 'di yang chos can 'gog pa yin pas na ji ltar 'gal ba ma yin /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di yang chos can 'gog pa yin pas na ji ltar 'gal ba ma yin /
translated: But since this reason also refutes the subject, how can it not be contradictory?

original: brjod pa 'di chos can la gnod pa mi byed de /
analyzed: brjod pa 'di chos can la gnod pa mi byed de /
translated: We reply: This does not undermine the subject.

original: ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i chos can gyi ngo bo mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma brtags na nyams dga' ba'i chos can gyi ngo bo mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the nature of the subject, which is delightful when not analyzed, is not rejected.

original: 'di ltar snang ba 'di nyid la ni bsnyon pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba 'di nyid la ni bsnyon pa ma yin gyi /
translated: In this way, we do not deny what appears.

original: 'on kyang sgro btags pa la yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang sgro btags pa la yin la /
translated: However, we do deny superimpositions.

original: don dam pa'i chos can bkag pa na skabs kyis bsgrub bya'i chos la gnod pa ci yang med de /
analyzed: don dam pa'i chos can bkag pa na skabs kyis bsgrub bya'i chos la gnod pa ci yang med de /
translated: When the ultimate subject is refuted, there is no contradiction at all with the property to be proven.

original: @52b kha cig ni chos can 'ba' zhig la gnod pa'ang skyon dang ldan par khas len te /
analyzed: @52b kha cig ni chos can 'ba' zhig la gnod pa'ang skyon dang ldan par khas len te /
translated: Some accept that even a mere contradiction of the subject is a fault.🔽For example, it is like the refutation of the following explanation:

original: dper na mkha' sogs gzhan dag gis //
analyzed: dper na mkha' sogs gzhan dag gis //
translated: Space and so forth are not unproduced,

original: sngon med rang bzhin skyed med min //
analyzed: sngon med rang bzhin skyed med min //
translated: because they are not the nature of the previously nonexistent.

original: cig car sgra sogs rgyun min phyir //🔽zhes bshad pa la sun 'byin pas /
analyzed: cig car sgra sogs rgyun min phyir // zhes bshad pa la sun 'byin pas /
translated: Sound and so forth are not momentary,🔽because they are not simultaneous.

original: de bzhin mkha' sogs chos can gyi //
analyzed: de bzhin mkha' sogs chos can gyi //
translated: In the same way, space and so forth

original: dngos po'i ngo bo 'ang med brjod bzhin //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo 'ang med brjod bzhin //
translated: are said to be the nature of things that do not exist.

original: de ltar 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya la //
translated: In this way, the probandum

original: gnod pa ci yang med pa nyid //🔽ces gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa ci yang med pa nyid // ces gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: is not contradicted at all.

original: 'dis ni sgrub byed kyi chos la gnod pa yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni sgrub byed kyi chos la gnod pa yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This also explains the contradiction of the predicate of the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This reason is also not indefinite,

original: rnam pa gzhan med pas na don dam pa pa la gcig dang du ma dag gis khyab pa'i phyir dang / khyab byed med na yang khyab bya mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan med pas na don dam pa pa la gcig dang du ma dag gis khyab pa'i phyir dang / khyab byed med na yang khyab bya mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in the ultimate, one and many are mutually exclusive, and if the pervader does not exist, the pervaded is not tenable.

original: gal te don dam pa pa la gcig dang du mas khyab pa 'ga' zhig tu dmigs na de skad du smra bar nus pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te don dam pa pa la gcig dang du mas khyab pa 'ga' zhig tu dmigs na de skad du smra bar nus pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the ultimate were observed to be pervaded by one or many, then how could one speak in that way?

original: stong pa nyid du smra ba ltar na de 'gar yang dmigs te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid du smra ba ltar na de 'gar yang dmigs te /
translated: According to the proponents of emptiness, it is observed in some way,

original: dmigs na de kho na stong pa nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs na de kho na stong pa nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it were observed, it would follow that it is not emptiness.

original: khyab pa ma bsgrubs na yang grub pa bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: khyab pa ma bsgrubs na yang grub pa bzlog par dka'o //
translated: If the pervasion is not established, then it is difficult to reverse the established conclusion.

original: bzlog par bla ste /
analyzed: bzlog par bla ste /
translated: It can be reversed.

original: gang 'dir 'gag par bya ba don dam pa zhes bya ba ni 'gar yang dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang 'dir 'gag par bya ba don dam pa zhes bya ba ni 'gar yang dmigs pa sngon du 'gro ba ma yin gyi /
translated: That which is to be stopped here, called the “ultimate,” is not preceded by observation anywhere.

original: 'on kyang rtag par sgro btags pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtag par sgro btags pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu yin la /
translated: However, it is like the permanence that is imputed to be permanent.

original: sgro btags pa de la yang gcig dang du ma dag gis khyab pas na /
analyzed: sgro btags pa de la yang gcig dang du ma dag gis khyab pas na /
translated: Since that imputation is pervaded by one and many,

original: sgro btags pa'i khyab par byed pa bkag pas sgro btags pa'i khyab par bya ba 'gog par byed pa kho bo cag ci khyab pa ma grub pa'i gnod pas nyams par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i khyab par byed pa bkag pas sgro btags pa'i khyab par bya ba 'gog par byed pa kho bo cag ci khyab pa ma grub pa'i gnod pas nyams par 'gyur ram /
translated: Since we refute the superimposition of the pervader, we refute the superimposition of the pervaded. Are we undermined by the fault of not establishing the pervasion?

original: des na mkhas pa rnams kyis ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon gsum gyis stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sgrub byed 'di blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na mkhas pa rnams kyis ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon gsum gyis stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sgrub byed 'di blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the wise should accept this proof of emptiness that is empty of the three faults, such as not being established, and so on.

original: gzhan yang stong pa nyid la sdang ba'i rnam par shes pa smra ba kha cig ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang stong pa nyid la sdang ba'i rnam par shes pa smra ba kha cig ni /
translated: Moreover, some who speak with an awareness that is hostile to emptiness say,

original: re zhig 'di ltar rnam par shes pa la ma gtogs pa'i don ni ci yang med la de ni gcig yin du zin yang phyi dang nang du yongs su gyur pa na /
analyzed: re zhig 'di ltar rnam par shes pa la ma gtogs pa'i don ni ci yang med la de ni gcig yin du zin yang phyi dang nang du yongs su gyur pa na /
translated: “In this way, there are no objects at all that are not included in consciousness. Although it is a single entity, when it transforms into outer and inner,

original: ma rig pa'i dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor snang ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i dbang gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor snang ngo //
translated: through the power of ignorance, it appears in the aspect of apprehendeds and apprehenders.

original: de la gnyis kyi ngo bo tsam med pa yin la /
analyzed: de la gnyis kyi ngo bo tsam med pa yin la /
translated: In that, there is no entity of duality at all.

original: des stong pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bden pa dam pa yin no zhes 'dod de /
analyzed: des stong pa'i rnam par shes pa ni bden pa dam pa yin no zhes 'dod de /
translated: Consciousness, which is empty of that, is the highest truth.”

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: They say this.

original: yongs gcod nang yin phyir rol ltar //
analyzed: yongs gcod nang yin phyir rol ltar //
translated: Because it is internally determined.

original: gnas pa 'di ni cha gzhan @53a * //
analyzed: gnas pa 'di ni cha gzhan @53a * //
translated: This is the other aspect of the state,

original: te ; / tha dad med pa'i shes pa la //
analyzed: te ; / tha dad med pa'i shes pa la //
translated: In the nondual cognition,

original: tha dad snang ba bslang ba yin //
analyzed: tha dad snang ba bslang ba yin //
translated: The appearance of duality is produced.

original: zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: This is what is explained.

original: nang du snang ba'i shes pa 'di gzhan yin la phyi rol du snang ba yang gzhan kho na'o //
analyzed: nang du snang ba'i shes pa 'di gzhan yin la phyi rol du snang ba yang gzhan kho na'o //
translated: This cognition that appears internally is one thing, and the external appearance is another.

original: gnyis po de la yang gnyis med pa yin te /
analyzed: gnyis po de la yang gnyis med pa yin te /
translated: And in those two, there is nonduality,

original: rang rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is mere self-awareness.🔽The conceptual thought that arises by its power superimposes on them the nature of object and subject.

original: de'i stobs kyis byung ba'i rnam par rtog pas ni de dag la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor sgro btags pa de las des sgro btags pa gnyis kyi ngo bo brdzun pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis byung ba'i rnam par rtog pas ni de dag la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor sgro btags pa de las des sgro btags pa gnyis kyi ngo bo brdzun pa yin la /
translated: From that, the nature of the two superimpositions is false.

original: gnyis med pa ni brdzun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis med pa ni brdzun pa ma yin te /
translated: But nonduality is not false.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said,

original: rtogs pa gcig ni nang du snang //
analyzed: rtogs pa gcig ni nang du snang //
translated: One cognition appears internally,

original: gzhan ni phyi rol snang ba ste //🔽de dag mar me gnyis bzhin du //
analyzed: gzhan ni phyi rol snang ba ste // de dag mar me gnyis bzhin du //
translated: The other appears externally.🔽Like two lamps,

original: gsal bya gsal byed nyid ma yin //
analyzed: gsal bya gsal byed nyid ma yin //
translated: They are not the illuminated and the illuminator.

original: dkar dang bde sogs rig pa yi //
analyzed: dkar dang bde sogs rig pa yi //
translated: The cognition of white, pleasure, and so on,

original: rig bya rig byed ngo bo ni //
analyzed: rig bya rig byed ngo bo ni //
translated: The essence of the object of awareness and the awareness is

original: de yi nus pa las byung ba'i //
analyzed: de yi nus pa las byung ba'i //
translated: the mere appearance of the object, arising from the potential of that.

original: rtogs pa tsam gyis sprul pa'i yin //🔽zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam gyis sprul pa'i yin // zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is a magical creation of mere understanding.

original: yang gzhan dag ni phyi dang nang dang snga ma dang phyi ma dang sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye bas stong pa'i sna tshogs kyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa gcig don dam par khas len to //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag ni phyi dang nang dang snga ma dang phyi ma dang sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i rnam par dbye bas stong pa'i sna tshogs kyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa gcig don dam par khas len to //
translated: Others accept that a single consciousness, which has the aspect of a variety, is ultimate, because it is empty of the distinctions of external and internal, prior and subsequent, blue and non-blue.

original: 'o na phyi rol dang nang gi rnam par dbye ba ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na phyi rol dang nang gi rnam par dbye ba ji ltar zhe na /
translated: But how can there be a distinction between external and internal?

original: brjod pa / phyi dang nang zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: brjod pa / phyi dang nang zhes bya ba ni //
translated: We reply: External and internal are

original: yul dang dus la ltos pas yin //
analyzed: yul dang dus la ltos pas yin //
translated: dependent on object and time.

original: rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since the essence is not realized,

original: yul dang dus ni 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: yul dang dus ni 'thad ma yin //
translated: object and time are not tenable.

original: 'dir snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa tha dad pa yang brtags pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: 'dir snga ma dang phyi ma la sogs pa tha dad pa yang brtags pa kho na yin la /
translated: Here, distinctions such as prior and subsequent are only imagined.

original: rtogs pa yang rang gi ngo bor myong ba yin pas na shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtogs pa yang rang gi ngo bor myong ba yin pas na shes pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the realization is the experience of the essence, it is the nature of consciousness.

original: de la yang don dam par na tha dad par snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la yang don dam par na tha dad par snang ba ma yin no //
translated: In the ultimate sense, however, there is no appearance of difference.

original: rtogs pa dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba ni 'gas kyang rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba ni 'gas kyang rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The distinction between the cognized and the cognizer is not cognized by anyone.

original: gang gi phyir rang rig pa'i khongs su ma 'dus na ni tha dad pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang rig pa'i khongs su ma 'dus na ni tha dad pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is not included in self-awareness, it is not cognized,

original: rtogs pa ni rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni rang rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because cognition has the characteristic of self-awareness.

original: de'i khongs su 'dus na yang ma yin nam ste /
analyzed: de'i khongs su 'dus na yang ma yin nam ste /
translated: If it is included in it, it is not,

original: rang las tha dad pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang las tha dad pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory for it to be different from itself.

original: shes dang don gyi tha dad min //
analyzed: shes dang don gyi tha dad min //
translated: Cognition is not different from the object.

original: sngon la sogs pas byas pa'ang min //
analyzed: sngon la sogs pas byas pa'ang min //
translated: It is not produced by prior and so on.

original: sngon dang phyi ma'i ngo bor ni //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi ma'i ngo bor ni //
translated: The nature of prior and posterior

original: mngon sum gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: is not established by direct perception.

original: zhes gang bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa'o //
translated: This is what was explained.

original: gzhan dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa'i byed pa nyid du nang du yongs su gsal ba'i bde ba la @53b sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni don dam pa pa'i rnam par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa'i byed pa nyid du nang du yongs su gsal ba'i bde ba la @53b sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid ni don dam pa pa'i rnam par shes pa yin la /
translated: Others say that the ultimate consciousness is that which is clearly manifest internally as the basis for the apprehension of self, such as pleasure.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa ni ma rig pas nye bar bstan pa gcig dang du mas stong pas stong pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa ni ma rig pas nye bar bstan pa gcig dang du mas stong pas stong pa kho na'o //
translated: The aspect of the object is empty, because it is empty of being either one with or different from the apprehender, and it is empty of being either one or many as taught by ignorance.

original: de med pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i 'dzin pa bde ba la sogs pa yang med pa yin te /
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir de la ltos pa'i 'dzin pa bde ba la sogs pa yang med pa yin te /
translated: Because it does not exist, the apprehender that depends on it, such as pleasure, also does not exist.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi tsam ste //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi tsam ste //
translated: The mere basis for the apprehension of self

original: blo yi ngo bo rnam med yin //
analyzed: blo yi ngo bo rnam med yin //
translated: Is the nature of the mind, which is devoid of aspects.

original: 'khrul pa yi ni rnam pa rnams //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yi ni rnam pa rnams //
translated: The aspects of error

original: sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du snang //
analyzed: sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du snang //
translated: Appear like an illusion.

original: zhes gang bshad pa snyam du lta'o //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa snyam du lta'o //
translated: This is what they think.

original: kha cig ni don dam pa pa'i shes pa ni /
analyzed: kha cig ni don dam pa pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: Some say that the ultimate consciousness

original: rnam pa med pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa nyid yin la /
translated: Is devoid of aspects.

original: de yang tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis myong bas grub pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis myong bas grub pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, it is not established by the experience of those who see only the near side.

original: 'on kyang da lta ni kun rdzob gzhi med par 'byung ba med pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes rtogs ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang da lta ni kun rdzob gzhi med par 'byung ba med pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes rtogs ste /
translated: But now, it is to be inferred from the fact that the relative does not occur without a basis.

original: 'di yi ngo bo rnam med cing //
analyzed: 'di yi ngo bo rnam med cing //
translated: Its nature is not form,

original: gos med ldang ba yin par 'dod //
analyzed: gos med ldang ba yin par 'dod //
translated: and it is held to be unclothed and rising.

original: de ni mkhas pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: de ni mkhas pa ma yin pas //
translated: That is not known by the wise,

original: nam yang shes par nus ma yin //
analyzed: nam yang shes par nus ma yin //
translated: and never can be known.

original: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is explained.

original: phyogs de rnams las gcig kyang stong pa nyid las log pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs de rnams las gcig kyang stong pa nyid las log pa ma yin te /
translated: Among those positions, not one is opposed to emptiness.

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis /
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis /
translated: Ārya Nāgārjuna said:

original: stong pa nyid kyi seng ge'i sgras //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi seng ge'i sgras //
translated: With the lion’s roar of emptiness,

original: skrag pa'i rgol ba thams cad ni //
analyzed: skrag pa'i rgol ba thams cad ni //
translated: all opponents are frightened,

original: gang dang gang du 'jug 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang dang gang du 'jug 'gyur ba //
translated: and wherever they go,

original: de dang der ni stong pa nyid //🔽ces gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang der ni stong pa nyid // ces gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: there emptiness goes too.

original: 'di ltar phyogs dang po ni tha dad par snang ba'i mngon sum nyid kyis mi bzod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs dang po ni tha dad par snang ba'i mngon sum nyid kyis mi bzod do //
translated: Thus the first position is not tenable because of the direct perception of different appearances.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rigs pa smra bas /
analyzed: rigs pa smra bas /
translated: The proponent of reasoning says:

original: dkar sdug la sogs tha dad snang //
analyzed: dkar sdug la sogs tha dad snang //
translated: White, beautiful, and so on appear different.

original: tha dad ma yin blo myong ni //🔽tha dad med snang tha dad na //
analyzed: tha dad ma yin blo myong ni // tha dad med snang tha dad na //
translated: The experience of mind is not different.🔽If there is difference in the appearance of non-difference,

original: tha dad tha dad med na ci //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad med na ci //
translated: what is the difference in difference and non-difference?

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: gzhan gyis gzhan nyid nyams phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan nyid nyams phyir ro //
translated: Because difference is impaired by difference.

original: dngos mthong med phyir gcig ma yin //
analyzed: dngos mthong med phyir gcig ma yin //
translated: Since the thing is not seen, it is not one.

original: blo dngos tha dad med mthong bas //
analyzed: blo dngos tha dad med mthong bas //
translated: Since the mind is seen as not different from the thing,

original: tha dad med par nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad med par nges par 'gyur //
translated: It is ascertained as not different.

original: zhes pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: And also,

original: bde sogs tha dad med dngos phyir //
analyzed: bde sogs tha dad med dngos phyir //
translated: Because pleasure, etc. are not different things,

original: dngos sogs cig car 'dzin yin na //
analyzed: dngos sogs cig car 'dzin yin na //
translated: If they are apprehended simultaneously,

original: tha dad snang ba'i gzung ba dang // sems nge ci phyir tha mi dad //🔽ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad snang ba'i gzung ba dang // sems nge ci phyir tha mi dad // ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Why is the appearance of difference not apprehended as the mind?

original: 'dir sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang las tha dad par snang ba de ni de las tha mi dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang las tha dad par snang ba de ni de las tha mi dad pa ma yin te /
translated: Here the syllogism is: Whatever appears as different from something is not non-different from it,

original: dper na sdug bsngal las bde ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sdug bsngal las bde ba bzhin no //
translated: like pleasure from pain.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //🔽skad cig nyid la sogs @54a * //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o // skad cig nyid la sogs @54a * //
translated: This is the observation of a contradiction in the performance of a distinction.

original: pas ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: pas ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the existence of the object is not ascertained by the cognition, because

original: de ni mngon sum la rang gi ngo bo las tha mi dad pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir dang / dngos po'i ngo bo mi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum la rang gi ngo bo las tha mi dad pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir dang / dngos po'i ngo bo mi 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the object appears as not different from the essence of the cognition itself, and because the appearance does not exist in a conceptual cognition that does not grasp the essence of the object.

original: gal te 'khrul par ma dmigs mod /
analyzed: gal te 'khrul par ma dmigs mod /
translated: If it is said that the object is not perceived because it is mistaken,

original: srid pa ni ldog tu med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: srid pa ni ldog tu med pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the case that existence is not averted?

original: ma rig pa'i dbang gis tha dad med pa yang tha dad par snang ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i dbang gis tha dad med pa yang tha dad par snang ngo //
translated: Although there is no difference due to the power of ignorance, there is an appearance of difference.

original: 'di ni ma rig pa'i ma rig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni ma rig pa'i ma rig pa nyid yin te /
translated: This is the ignorance of ignorance.

original: gang phyin ci log gi ngo bor nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang phyin ci log gi ngo bor nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called the teaching of the essence of error.

original: 'di ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs te /
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: phyin ci log tu gsal ba dang po nyid du bkag pa'i phyir dang / shes pa la khyab par du ma'i 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu gsal ba dang po nyid du bkag pa'i phyir dang / shes pa la khyab par du ma'i 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has been refuted from the very beginning that it is clearly manifest in a distorted way, and because it is not tenable that it pervades consciousness.

original: dngos po gzhan la shes pa nyid phyin ci log tu gsal ba yin gyi shes pa la ni gzhan nyid du srid pa ma yin na /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan la shes pa nyid phyin ci log tu gsal ba yin gyi shes pa la ni gzhan nyid du srid pa ma yin na /
translated: If consciousness is clearly manifest in a distorted way with respect to other things, it is not tenable that it is distorted with respect to itself.

original: de rang la phyin ci log yin no zhes smra ba ni ci ltar smyon pa ma yin /
analyzed: de rang la phyin ci log yin no zhes smra ba ni ci ltar smyon pa ma yin /
translated: How could you not be insane to say that it is distorted with respect to itself?

original: gzhan yang gal te shes pa gzhan du gsal na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te shes pa gzhan du gsal na /
translated: Moreover, if consciousness is clearly manifest in a distorted way,

original: 'o na rang gi ngo bor ma yin la /
analyzed: 'o na rang gi ngo bor ma yin la /
translated: then it is not clearly manifest in its own nature.

original: de lta na yang gcig tu gsal ba'i ngo bo can la mi gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / gsal ba yang phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang gcig tu gsal ba'i ngo bo can la mi gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / gsal ba yang phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if that is so, then it is not tenable that it is clearly manifest in a single nature, because it is distorted, and because clarity is distorted.

original: shes pa la ngo bo ci yang med pas na /
analyzed: shes pa la ngo bo ci yang med pas na /
translated: Since consciousness has no nature at all,

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba tshegs med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba tshegs med par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is established without effort that it is essenceless.

original: gzhan yang ngo bo tha mi dad pa yang mi rigs pas tha dad par rig go zhes smra ba rnams kyi ltar na rnam par shes pa rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan yang ngo bo tha mi dad pa yang mi rigs pas tha dad par rig go zhes smra ba rnams kyi ltar na rnam par shes pa rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul par 'gyur la /
translated: According to those who say this, consciousness would be mistaken with respect to its own nature.

original: de lta na yang rang rig pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan rig pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rang rig pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan rig pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir na /
translated: Moreover, since reflexive awareness does not exist and since it is untenable that consciousness is aware of something other than itself,

original: rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba rgyun chad pas na sna tshogs nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba rgyun chad pas na sna tshogs nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: all clarity would be completely interrupted, and the variety of appearances would disappear.

original: skye ba las gzhan pa'i bya ba yang mi srid de /
analyzed: skye ba las gzhan pa'i bya ba yang mi srid de /
translated: Moreover, it is impossible for there to be an action that is different from arising.

original: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
translated: All conditioned phenomena are momentary.🔽How could there be an action

original: mi brtan rnams la bya ga las //
analyzed: mi brtan rnams la bya ga las //
translated: in unstable things?

original: 'di dag 'byung ba gang yin de //
analyzed: 'di dag 'byung ba gang yin de //
translated: That which is the arising of these

original: bya ba de nyid byed par brjod //
analyzed: bya ba de nyid byed par brjod //
translated: is said to be the action.

original: de lta yang tha dad par snang ba yang shes pa de ltar skyes pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: de lta yang tha dad par snang ba yang shes pa de ltar skyes pa nyid yin la /
translated: Even though it appears to be different, it is the arising of consciousness itself that appears that way.

original: de lta na yang 'di'i rang gi ngo bo kho na tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang 'di'i rang gi ngo bo kho na tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Even though that is the case, its own nature would be different.

original: 'di ni rnam pa gzhan du gsal ba smra ba 'di'i skam la lhung bar 'dod pa 'dam du lhung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa gzhan du gsal ba smra ba 'di'i skam la lhung bar 'dod pa 'dam du lhung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This is the other aspect of the assertion of the manifestation of consciousness. The one who falls into the swamp of the desire for dry land will fall into the swamp.

original: byis pa'i gyal pa smra ba la gus pas chog go //
analyzed: byis pa'i gyal pa smra ba la gus pas chog go //
translated: Enough of the prattle of the childish!

original: des na de ltar re zhig phyogs dang po ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar re zhig phyogs dang po ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the first position is not reasonable.

original: gnyis pa yang mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gnyis pa yang mi 'thad do //
translated: The second position is also untenable.

original: @54b gal te gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'dod pa'i shes pa dag tha dad yin na de'i tshe rgyud gzhan la sogs pa dag bzhin du nges par phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: @54b gal te gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'dod pa'i shes pa dag tha dad yin na de'i tshe rgyud gzhan la sogs pa dag bzhin du nges par phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa 'gyur zhing /
translated: If the consciousnesses that are asserted to be the apprehended and apprehender are different, then they would definitely be mutually hidden from each other, like different continua.

original: de gnyi ga rang rig pa'i mthar thug pas na gcig la gcig gtam yang mi shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gnyi ga rang rig pa'i mthar thug pas na gcig la gcig gtam yang mi shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: And since both are ultimately reflexive awareness, they would not even know each other’s existence.

original: phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa yin mod ;
analyzed: phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa yin mod ;
translated: “They are mutually hidden from each other.”

original: skyon ci yod pa yin nam /
analyzed: skyon ci yod pa yin nam /
translated: “So what?”

original: ngas 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i zhen pa mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: ngas 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i zhen pa mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: “It is untenable to say, ‘I see this.’”

original: de gnyi ga'i nus pa las byung ba de lta bu'i zhen pa la 'gal ba ci yod /
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i nus pa las byung ba de lta bu'i zhen pa la 'gal ba ci yod /
translated: What contradiction is there in the arising of such an assertion from the power of both?

original: rgyud gzhan la yang thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan la yang thal lo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it follows that there is a single seer in other continua,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: de de la nus pa med pa'i phyir dang / nus pa yod na 'bras bu skye ba bzlog tu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de de la nus pa med pa'i phyir dang / nus pa yod na 'bras bu skye ba bzlog tu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that consciousness does not have the power to see form and because if it did have the power, the result would be that form would be seen.

original: 'di yang rgyu gcig la yod pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang rgyu gcig la yod pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: If you ask how this is so when it exists in a single cause,

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig la skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig la skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: it is because it arises in a single foundation consciousness.

original: 'dir brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir brjod par bya ste /
translated: Here we say:

original: phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa yin na rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa yin na rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are mutually hidden, then a single cognizer would not be directly perceiving.

original: bdag med par smra ba rnams dang / khyad par du rnal 'byor spyod pa pa ltar na rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i lta ba po gcig ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag med par smra ba rnams dang / khyad par du rnal 'byor spyod pa pa ltar na rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i lta ba po gcig ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: According to the proponents of no-self, and especially according to the Yogācāra, there is no single seer that is different from consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi lta ba po bde ba la sogs pa gzhan kho na yin pa la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi lta ba po bde ba la sogs pa gzhan kho na yin pa la /
translated: The seer that is the nature of consciousness is the same as pleasure and so on,

original: sngon po la sogs pa gzhan kho na yin pas na de gnyi ga la lkog tu gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ;
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa gzhan kho na yin pas na de gnyi ga la lkog tu gyur pa ma yin par 'gyur ;
translated: but since blue and so on are different from it, both are hidden to it.

original: ji ste 'dir rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ji ste 'dir rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: But if you assert that the one who understands is not a direct perceiver,

original: 'on kyang rtog pas de lta bu nyid du rlom pa yin no zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtog pas de lta bu nyid du rlom pa yin no zhes 'dod na /
translated: but rather that it is just conceptual thought that conceives of it in that way,

original: 'o na de lta na /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na /
translated: then in that case,

original: rgyud gzhan la yod pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba las mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi rgyud la yod par khyad par du mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: rgyud gzhan la yod pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba las mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi rgyud la yod par khyad par du mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: the appearance of blue and so on that exists in another mindstream would not be distinguished from the one that is asserted to exist in the mindstream of a sentient being.

original: /'di dag ni rtog pa skye ba dang mi skye ba tsam gyi tha dad par byas pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang snang ba dang mi snang bas byas pa yin la /
analyzed: /'di dag ni rtog pa skye ba dang mi skye ba tsam gyi tha dad par byas pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang snang ba dang mi snang bas byas pa yin la /
translated: These are not distinguished merely in terms of whether a thought arises or not, but rather in terms of whether there is an appearance or not.

original: des na rtogs pa po tha dad pa la zhig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa po tha dad pa la zhig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore the one who understands would be different.

original: 'dis ni cig car du skyes pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang tha dad pa yin na phan tshun lkog tu gyur par bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dis ni cig car du skyes pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang tha dad pa yin na phan tshun lkog tu gyur par bshad pa yin la /
translated: This explains that if the consciousnesses of form and so on that arise simultaneously are different, they are mutually hidden.

original: des kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa la rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab yongs su rtogs pa na phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa na phyi rol gyi don smra ba la rags par snang ba 'gal bar brjod pa bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: des kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa la rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab yongs su rtogs pa na phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa na phyi rol gyi don smra ba la rags par snang ba 'gal bar brjod pa bsal ba yin te /
translated: Thus, when the Yogacarin understands the atoms of consciousness, he refutes the assertion of the external object proponents that the appearance of gross objects is not contradictory when the atoms are mutually obscured.

original: ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab rnams rang rig pa tsam gyis mthar thug @55a * //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab rnams rang rig pa tsam gyis mthar thug @55a * //
translated: Just as the atoms of consciousness are not mutually cognized because they are ultimate,

original: pas phan tshun ma rig pa de kho na bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang yin pas na yul drug po rags pa'i rnam par myong ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: pas phan tshun ma rig pa de kho na bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa yang yin pas na yul drug po rags pa'i rnam par myong ba mi 'thad do //
translated: so too is the cognition of form, etc. Therefore, the experience of the six objects in the aspect of grossness is not tenable.

original: des na 'dir rang gi phyogs kyi skyon ma bltas par gzhan la smod pas na zla ba'i ra ri la rtog par gzhol ba'i mig yon lta bu yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir rang gi phyogs kyi skyon ma bltas par gzhan la smod pas na zla ba'i ra ri la rtog par gzhol ba'i mig yon lta bu yin no //
translated: Thus, here, since one is criticizing the other without looking at the faults of one’s own position, one is like a person with cataracts of the eye who is intent on examining the spots of the moon.

original: nyes pa mtshungs pa'i phyir bdag med par smra bas rnal 'byor spyod pa smad par mi nus su chug mod /
analyzed: nyes pa mtshungs pa'i phyir bdag med par smra bas rnal 'byor spyod pa smad par mi nus su chug mod /
translated: Although the proponent of selflessness cannot criticize the Yogacarin because of the similarity of faults,

original: bdag tu smra ba smod pa gang gis bzlog ste /
analyzed: bdag tu smra ba smod pa gang gis bzlog ste /
translated: How could one refute the claim of self?

original: bdag yod na shes pa rnams phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa na de'i yul rnams rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'gal lo zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag yod na shes pa rnams phan tshun lkog tu gyur pa na de'i yul rnams rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'gal lo zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If the self exists, when the consciousnesses are mutually hidden, it is not contradictory for a single cognizer to directly perceive their objects.

original: der yang 'gal ba mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: der yang 'gal ba mtshungs pa'i phyir te /
translated: That is not so, because the contradiction is the same.

original: 'di ltar de bems po zhig pa yin nam /🔽bems po ma yin pa yin grang /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bems po zhig pa yin nam / bems po ma yin pa yin grang /
translated: In that case, is that self an inanimate thing or not?

original: phyogs dang po ltar na 'dir rang nyid kyis ci yang mi rtogs shing /
analyzed: phyogs dang po ltar na 'dir rang nyid kyis ci yang mi rtogs shing /
translated: If it is the first, then it does not understand anything at all.

original: rtogs pa dang ldan pas na rtogs pa po zhes tha snyad 'dogs la /
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ldan pas na rtogs pa po zhes tha snyad 'dogs la /
translated: It is designated as a cognizer because it possesses understanding.

original: de lta na yang shes pa gang gis gzugs shes pa des sgra yongs su mi gcod pa na /
analyzed: de lta na yang shes pa gang gis gzugs shes pa des sgra yongs su mi gcod pa na /
translated: In that case, when one consciousness understands form, it does not eliminate sound.

original: don dam par na de gnyis rtogs pa po gcig pa can du mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: don dam par na de gnyis rtogs pa po gcig pa can du mi 'grub bo //
translated: In that case, ultimately, it is not established that those two are possessed by a single cognizer.

original: rtog pa gnyis rten gcig pa'i phyir skyon med na /
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis rten gcig pa'i phyir skyon med na /
translated: If you say that there is no error because the two thoughts are based on one,🔽then it follows that the two thoughts are one.

original: de dag kyang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig gi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gcig gis rgyu can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag kyang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gcig gi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gcig gis rgyu can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are caused by a single foundation consciousness and because they are caused by a single equivalent immediately preceding condition,

original: de dag rten gcig par 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de dag rten gcig par 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: they are asserted to have a single support.

original: rten gcig pa yin yang gnyi ga phan tshun gyi ngo bo spyod yul mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de gnyis ka'i bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir nyes pa yod pa kho na'o zhes na /
analyzed: rten gcig pa yin yang gnyi ga phan tshun gyi ngo bo spyod yul mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / de gnyis ka'i bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i shes pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir nyes pa yod pa kho na'o zhes na /
translated: Even though they have a single support, the error still exists because the two do not cognize each other’s natures and objects and because there is no other consciousness that cognizes the natures of both.

original: de ci gang gis de yod na mi 'byung ba 'di bdag la 'jigs sam /
analyzed: de ci gang gis de yod na mi 'byung ba 'di bdag la 'jigs sam /
translated: If you ask, “What is the harm if they do not mutually cognize each other?”

original: gal te bod pa dang mtshungs pa'i bdag yod mod /
analyzed: gal te bod pa dang mtshungs pa'i bdag yod mod /
translated: If the self is similar to the body, it exists.

original: 'on kyang shes pa de dag phan tshun gyi ngo bo 'am yul rig pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang shes pa de dag phan tshun gyi ngo bo 'am yul rig pa ma yin la /
translated: However, those consciousnesses do not cognize each other’s natures or objects.

original: de dag gis de gnyis gzhan gyis kyang rig pa ma yin pas na nyes pa de'i gnas skabs te /
analyzed: de dag gis de gnyis gzhan gyis kyang rig pa ma yin pas na nyes pa de'i gnas skabs te /
translated: And those two are not cognized by anything else. Therefore the error still exists.

original: de'i rtogs pa rtogs pa po la'ang tha dad par yang ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rtogs pa rtogs pa po la'ang tha dad par yang ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and the realization of that would also be the realizer, which is absurd.

original: ma yin te ;
analyzed: ma yin te ;
translated: This is not so.🔽🔽

original: 'dus pa nges par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus pa nges par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because the collection definitely performs the action.

original: thams cad du gcig nges par byed pa ga las /
analyzed: thams cad du gcig nges par byed pa ga las /
translated: How can it be that one thing definitely performs the action everywhere?

original: khyad par du byed pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pas 'gal ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pas 'gal ba med do zhe na /
translated: There is no contradiction because it is differentiated by the particular that distinguishes it.

original: de ni gcig nyid nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni gcig nyid nyams pa yin no //
translated: That is the loss of its being one.

original: grangs dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba dang phyi dang 'du ba dang 'bras bu'i rdzas rnams @55b kyi tha dad pa'i tha snyad tsam khyad par du byed pa'i bye brag gis yin no zhe na /
analyzed: grangs dang ldan pa dang rnam par dbye ba dang phyi dang 'du ba dang 'bras bu'i rdzas rnams @55b kyi tha dad pa'i tha snyad tsam khyad par du byed pa'i bye brag gis yin no zhe na /
translated: The mere conventions of difference of number, possession, division, external contact, and resultant substance are distinguished by the particular that distinguishes them.

original: 'o na dngos su na chos 'ga' zhig chos can gcig las 'du ba gang yin pa de kho na rtogs pa yang yin pas na /
analyzed: 'o na dngos su na chos 'ga' zhig chos can gcig las 'du ba gang yin pa de kho na rtogs pa yang yin pas na /
translated: If so, then since the mere realization of that which is the contact of some phenomenon with one substratum is also the realization,

original: thams cad rtogs pa dang 'du ba'i phyir rtogs pa po nyid du thal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: thams cad rtogs pa dang 'du ba'i phyir rtogs pa po nyid du thal ba kho na'o //
translated: it follows that it is the realizer because it realizes all.

original: yang na gal te gzhan la rtogs pa dang 'du ba med pas na rtogs pa po nyid du mi 'dod na /
analyzed: yang na gal te gzhan la rtogs pa dang 'du ba med pas na rtogs pa po nyid du mi 'dod na /
translated: Or, if you do not accept the self as a cognizer because it is not related to cognition,

original: bdag kyang ji ltar 'dod /
analyzed: bdag kyang ji ltar 'dod /
translated: then why do you accept it?

original: de lta de yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta de yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it exists in that way.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: de dag 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not related.

original: 'brel pa khas len na yang thug pa med par thal ba'i mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa khas len na yang thug pa med par thal ba'i mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if you accept that they are related, the consequence of an infinite regress is not avoided.

original: rtogs pa dang 'du ba zhes bya ba yang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa dang 'du ba zhes bya ba yang mi 'grub ste /
translated: Also, the so-called relation of cognition and being cognized is not established,

original: de dang de la 'grel pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽rtogs pa yod do //
analyzed: de dang de la 'grel pa med pa'i phyir ro // rtogs pa yod do //
translated: because there is no connection between them.🔽The mere statement “cognition exists and being cognized exists” is not a proof that the self is a cognizer.

original: 'du ba yang yod do zhes bya ba de tsam gyis rtogs pa po nyid yin bdag bzhin du de las gzhan yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du ba yang yod do zhes bya ba de tsam gyis rtogs pa po nyid yin bdag bzhin du de las gzhan yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The self would be something other than cognition.

original: lus can ma yin pa'i rtogs pa la ni rten med la /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa'i rtogs pa la ni rten med la /
translated: A nonembodied cognition has no basis,

original: rten med par yang 'du ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: rten med par yang 'du ba zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no ;
translated: and without a basis, being cognized does not exist.

original: / skyed par byed pa tsam gyis rten yin na nam mkha' la sogs pa yang der thal lo //
analyzed: / skyed par byed pa tsam gyis rten yin na nam mkha' la sogs pa yang der thal lo //
translated: If something is a basis merely because it generates cognition, then space and so on would become that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,🔽because they are not a basis in the way that the self is.

original: de skyed pa po ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de skyed pa po ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is not a producer.

original: bdag kyang skyed pa po ji ltar yin /
analyzed: bdag kyang skyed pa po ji ltar yin /
translated: How is the self a producer?

original: de yod pa na yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de yod pa na yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it exists when they exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang yin mod /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang yin mod /
translated: Then it is also so in regard to space, etc.

original: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyis ni skyed pa po ma yin la nam mkha' la sogs pa la ldog pa ni med de /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba tsam gyis ni skyed pa po ma yin la nam mkha' la sogs pa la ldog pa ni med de /
translated: It is not a producer by mere association, but it is not the case that it is not a producer in regard to space, etc.

original: rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is permanent.

original: bdag la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: bdag la yang mtshungs so //
translated: The same is true of the self.

original: skyed byed du grags pa'i dbang po rnams kyi ci ltar rten ma yin /
analyzed: skyed byed du grags pa'i dbang po rnams kyi ci ltar rten ma yin /
translated: How is it not the basis of the faculties that are renowned as producers?

original: rtag pa yang skyed byed ma yin pas na bdag rtogs pa'i skyed pa po ma yin pa kho na'o ;
analyzed: rtag pa yang skyed byed ma yin pas na bdag rtogs pa'i skyed pa po ma yin pa kho na'o ;
translated: Since a permanent thing is not a producer, the self is certainly not a producer of the awareness of itself.

original: / skyed pa po ma yin na yang rtogs pa po ma yin no //
analyzed: / skyed pa po ma yin na yang rtogs pa po ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were not a producer, it would not be an experiencer.

original: bdag rtogs pa po yin no snyam du shes pas na de ltar yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bdag rtogs pa po yin no snyam du shes pas na de ltar yin no zhe na /
translated: It is so because it is known that the self is an experiencer.

original: thams cad du thal ba'i phyir 'brel pa med ni 'di nyid srid pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: thams cad du thal ba'i phyir 'brel pa med ni 'di nyid srid pa ma yin nam /
translated: Since it would follow that everything is so, this is not possible.

original: de lta bus rtogs pa po nyid yin na ni de gzugs la sogs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta bus rtogs pa po nyid yin na ni de gzugs la sogs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: If it were the self that is the cognizer, then it would also possess form, etc.

original: bdag dkar sham mo bdag 'gro'o zhes shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag dkar sham mo bdag 'gro'o zhes shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the cognition “I am fair” and “I go.”

original: ji ste 'di log pa'i shes pa yin na bdag rtogs pa po yin no zhes bya ba ci'i phyir ma yin /
analyzed: ji ste 'di log pa'i shes pa yin na bdag rtogs pa po yin no zhes bya ba ci'i phyir ma yin /
translated: But if this is a false cognition, why is it not the case that the self is the cognizer?

original: gnod byed med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gnod byed med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no contradiction.

original: 'dir gnod par byed pa ci yod /
analyzed: 'dir gnod par byed pa ci yod /
translated: What is the contradiction here?

original: dkar sham la bdag dkar sham ma yin no snyam pa'am /
analyzed: dkar sham la bdag dkar sham ma yin no snyam pa'am /
translated: It is not the case that the cognition “I am fair” or “I go”

original: 'gro ba @56a * //🔽po la bdag 'gro ba po ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa skyed pa ma yin no //🔽de ma thag tu bshad pas na gnod byed gnod byed ma yin pas bdag rtogs pa por rtogs pas mi 'grub po //
analyzed: 'gro ba @56a * // po la bdag 'gro ba po ma yin no snyam pa'i shes pa skyed pa ma yin no // de ma thag tu bshad pas na gnod byed gnod byed ma yin pas bdag rtogs pa por rtogs pas mi 'grub po //
translated: is produced with regard to the self.🔽Since it was just explained, the self is not established as the cognizer because of the contradiction or non-contradiction.

original: de'i phyir bdag bems por ni rtogs pa por mi 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag bems por ni rtogs pa por mi 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore it is not tenable that the self is the cognizer as an insentient thing.

original: de lta yin yang de smra ba rnams kyis ltar na yang gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta yin yang de smra ba rnams kyis ltar na yang gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi 'grub bo //
translated: But even according to those who maintain that, the one who perceives form and sound is not established by direct perception.

original: 'di las kyang mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di las kyang mi 'grub ste /
translated: And it is not established by inference either.

original: gzugs dang sgra dag gis rtogs pa po gcig kho na'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la tshad ma ci yang med do //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dag gis rtogs pa po gcig kho na'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di la tshad ma ci yang med do //
translated: There is no valid cognition at all for the proposition that there is only one perceiver of form and sound.

original: 'di ltar don 'di mngon sum gyis mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar don 'di mngon sum gyis mi 'grub ste /
translated: In this regard, this matter is not established by direct perception.

original: yid las skyes pa dang phyi rol gyi dbang po yang de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid las skyes pa dang phyi rol gyi dbang po yang de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mental faculty and the external sense faculties do not engage with it.

original: yid las byung ba ni gzugs sam sgra rtogs pa ma yin la phyi rol gyi dbang pos ni bdag ma yin no //
analyzed: yid las byung ba ni gzugs sam sgra rtogs pa ma yin la phyi rol gyi dbang pos ni bdag ma yin no //
translated: The mental faculty does not perceive form or sound, and the external sense faculties do not perceive the self.

original: 'dis ni gzugs dang sgra'i shes pa dag rten gcig pa nyid du mngon sum gyis shes pa yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzugs dang sgra'i shes pa dag rten gcig pa nyid du mngon sum gyis shes pa yin no zhes bya ba bsal ba yin te /
translated: This eliminates the idea that the consciousnesses of form and sound are known by direct perception to have the same basis.
