original: gzugs dang sgra dag ma gzung ba na blo de dag dang 'brel par rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dag ma gzung ba na blo de dag dang 'brel par rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when form and sound are not apprehended, it is not possible to know that mind is connected with them.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it by inference,

original: rtags med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no logical reason.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la yang de mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la yang de mi 'grub ste /
translated: Nor is it established in the second case,

original: 'di ltar bems po ma yin pa'i ngo bo yin na gzugs la sogs pa de rig pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'dod dgos la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bems po ma yin pa'i ngo bo yin na gzugs la sogs pa de rig pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'dod dgos la /
translated: because if it is not an entity of matter, then it must be asserted that matter, etc. are only the entity of awareness.

original: de dag tha dad pa na de'i bdag nyid can gyi bdag med de de yang nges par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa na de'i bdag nyid can gyi bdag med de de yang nges par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are different, then the self that has their nature does not exist, and it is definitely different.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum ji ltar yin zhes mi shes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum ji ltar yin zhes mi shes so //
translated: Therefore, how can one who understands matter, etc. be a direct perceiver?

original: ji ltar de dag bdag gcig las tha dad med na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag bdag gcig las tha dad med na /
translated: If they are not different from one self,

original: phan tshun tha dad pa yang btang ba yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa yang btang ba yin no //
translated: then mutual difference is also relinquished.

original: ci zhig ltar tha dad pas na 'gal ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig ltar tha dad pas na 'gal ba med do zhe na /
translated: If they are different in some way, how is there no contradiction?

original: 'o na bdag ngo bo gang gis rig pa las tha dad pa de'i sgo nas ni bems po kho na yin la /
analyzed: 'o na bdag ngo bo gang gis rig pa las tha dad pa de'i sgo nas ni bems po kho na yin la /
translated: Well then, in the way that the self is different from awareness, it is only matter.

original: gang gi sgo nas tha mi dad pa de'i sgo nas rig pa yin pas na bems po ma yin pa la yul du ma mngon sum du byed pa mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: gang gi sgo nas tha mi dad pa de'i sgo nas rig pa yin pas na bems po ma yin pa la yul du ma mngon sum du byed pa mi 'grub bo //
translated: Since it is cognition in the sense of being undifferentiated from that, it is not matter. Therefore, it is not established that it directly perceives many objects.

original: de'i phyir bdag yod dam med kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag yod dam med kyang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, whether or not the self exists,

original: cig car du snang ba'i gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi rigs so //
analyzed: cig car du snang ba'i gzugs la sogs pa rtogs pa po gcig gis mngon sum du mi rigs so //
translated: it is not reasonable that a single cognizer simultaneously perceives forms and so on.

original: 'dis ni cig car ma yin par snang ba rnams la yang de bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni cig car ma yin par snang ba rnams la yang de bsal ba yin te /
translated: This also refutes the simultaneous appearance of objects,

original: 'thad pa thun @56b mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'thad pa thun @56b mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a common argument.

original: de ltar na bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi de rtogs pa'i sa bon drungs phyung bar rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi de rtogs pa'i sa bon drungs phyung bar rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Thus it should be understood that the seed of the belief in a self has been uprooted.

original: bdag ni de smra ba rnams kyi ltar na dus mtshungs par snang ba dbang po tha dad pas gzung bar bya ba rnams dang / dus mtshungs pa ma yin par snang ba de dag gzhan gyi lta ba po gcig yin par grag la /
analyzed: bdag ni de smra ba rnams kyi ltar na dus mtshungs par snang ba dbang po tha dad pas gzung bar bya ba rnams dang / dus mtshungs pa ma yin par snang ba de dag gzhan gyi lta ba po gcig yin par grag la /
translated: For those who propound the self, it is renowned that the self is the single seer that simultaneously apprehends objects that are apprehended by different sense faculties and that it is the single hearer that simultaneously hears sounds that are heard by different ears.

original: 'di'i gcig nyid tshad mas mi bslu ba ma yin zhing bems po lta ba po nyid ma yin pas na /
analyzed: 'di'i gcig nyid tshad mas mi bslu ba ma yin zhing bems po lta ba po nyid ma yin pas na /
translated: Since this singularity is not undeceiving due to valid cognition and is not an inanimate observer,

original: bdag tu rtog pa la rtsa ba ci yang med do //
analyzed: bdag tu rtog pa la rtsa ba ci yang med do //
translated: there is absolutely no basis for the conception of a self.

original: 'dis ni kha cig na re bdag gis sngar shes par gyur to //
analyzed: 'dis ni kha cig na re bdag gis sngar shes par gyur to //
translated: Some may say, “I previously knew this,🔽and now I am aware of it myself.”

original: da lta bdag nyid kyis rig go snyam pa'i mngon sum gyis shes pas shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i shes pa po gcig rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: da lta bdag nyid kyis rig go snyam pa'i mngon sum gyis shes pas shes pa snga ma dang phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i shes pa po gcig rtogs pa yin la /
translated: Such direct perception cognizes a single knower connected to the previous and subsequent moments of consciousness.

original: de nyid bdag yin zhing 'dis bdag med par smra ba la gnod de /
analyzed: de nyid bdag yin zhing 'dis bdag med par smra ba la gnod de /
translated: That is the self, and this refutes the proponents of selflessness.

original: de skad du bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad du bshad pa /
translated: As it is explained:

original: rnam pa de 'dra'i skyes bu de //🔽ngo shes pa yi ngo bo yi //🔽rtogs pa yin te bdag med pa //
analyzed: rnam pa de 'dra'i skyes bu de // ngo shes pa yi ngo bo yi // rtogs pa yin te bdag med pa //
translated: The person of such a kind🔽Is realized through the nature🔽Of recognition; this refutes

original: 'di nyid kyis ni gnod pa yin //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni gnod pa yin //
translated: The proponents of selflessness.

original: zhes gang smras pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes gang smras pa de yang gsal ba yin te /
translated: This is clear.

original: bems po shes pa por mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / bems po ma yin pa shes pa tha dad pa na tha dad pa ma yin pa med pa'i phyir dang / ngo shes pa 'khrul pa yin pas na mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bems po shes pa por mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / bems po ma yin pa shes pa tha dad pa na tha dad pa ma yin pa med pa'i phyir dang / ngo shes pa 'khrul pa yin pas na mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is untenable that an insentient thing is a knower, because if the insentient thing and the consciousness are different, then that which is not different does not exist, and because recognition is mistaken, it is not direct perception.

original: gzhan yang bdag gis sngar shes par gyur to zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar gyi shes pa po dran pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gis sngar shes par gyur to zhes bya ba 'di ni sngar gyi shes pa po dran pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, “I knew it previously” is the memory of the previous knower.

original: da lta ngas shes so snyam pa ni da ltar ba'i 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: da lta ngas shes so snyam pa ni da ltar ba'i 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: “I know it now” is the present apprehension.

original: dus snga ma dang phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i shes pa po gcig gang gis 'dzin /
analyzed: dus snga ma dang phyi ma dang 'brel pa'i shes pa po gcig gang gis 'dzin /
translated: By what means does one apprehend the single knower related to the previous and later times?

original: ji ste shes pa 'di gcig yin du bcug kyang mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ste shes pa 'di gcig yin du bcug kyang mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: Even if one allows that this consciousness is one, it is not direct perception.

original: yul nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object is not present.

original: mngon sum ni rang gi dus su chad pa'i yul yod pa 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum ni rang gi dus su chad pa'i yul yod pa 'dzin gyi /
translated: Direct perception apprehends the existent object that is present at the time of itself.

original: dus gzhan gyis yongs su gcad pa'i ma yin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan gyis yongs su gcad pa'i ma yin no //
translated: It is not the object that is defined by another time.

original: dus gzhan du yongs su gcad pa'i yod pa ni dus gzhan gyi tshe lta bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan du yongs su gcad pa'i yod pa ni dus gzhan gyi tshe lta bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Existence at another time cannot be perceived at another time.

original: gzhan du na sngon gyi shes pas kyang da ltar ba'i yod pa 'dzin pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na sngon gyi shes pas kyang da ltar ba'i yod pa 'dzin pas 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, a previous consciousness would also apprehend the existence of the present.

original: de lta na yang ngo shes pa tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ngo shes pa tshad mar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even so, recognition would not be valid knowledge,

original: gzung zin pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //🔽yul dus la sogs bye brag gis //
analyzed: gzung zin pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // yul dus la sogs bye brag gis //
translated: because it would apprehend what has already been apprehended.

original: de yang tshad ma'i skabs yod do //
analyzed: de yang tshad ma'i skabs yod do //
translated: It is said:

original: da ltar ba yi yod pa nyid //
analyzed: da ltar ba yi yod pa nyid //
translated: It is not the case that the existence of the present

original: sngon gyi blo yis rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: sngon gyi blo yis rtogs ma yin //
translated: is realized by a previous cognition.

original: snyam na / de ci da ltar ba'i yod pa yang gzhan sngar yod pa yang gzhan yin nam /
analyzed: snyam na / de ci da ltar ba'i yod pa yang gzhan sngar yod pa yang gzhan yin nam /
translated: If you think that, then is the existence of the present also different from the previous existence?

original: de lta'o zhe na /
analyzed: de lta'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that is so,

original: 'o na khyod kyi @57a * //🔽rang rig gi tshig gis yul tha dad par khas blangs pas na /
analyzed: 'o na khyod kyi @57a * // rang rig gi tshig gis yul tha dad par khas blangs pas na /
translated: then your

original: ngo shes pa tshad mar legs par bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo shes pa tshad mar legs par bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: claim that the object is different through the words of reflexive awareness is excellent proof that recognition is valid knowledge.

original: ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that is not so,

original: 'o na gzung 'dzin mi 'dogs so //
analyzed: 'o na gzung 'dzin mi 'dogs so //
translated: then you do not posit apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: de lta na /
analyzed: de lta na /
translated: If that is so,🔽then your claim that the object is different through the words of reflexive awareness is excellent proof that recognition is valid knowledge.

original: yang 'di la sngar med pa'i don shes pa med pas na /
analyzed: yang 'di la sngar med pa'i don shes pa med pas na /
translated: Moreover, since there is no cognition of an object that did not exist previously,

original: re zhig tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin nam /
analyzed: re zhig tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin nam /
translated: is it not the case that it is not even a valid cognition?

original: mngon sum lta ci smos /
analyzed: mngon sum lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention it being a direct perception?

original: tha dad med par grub kyang dus la sogs pa 'brel pa can gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa rnam par gzhag go zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad med par grub kyang dus la sogs pa 'brel pa can gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa rnam par gzhag go zhe na /
translated: Even if it is established that they are not different, they are posited as different by the particulars that are related to time and so on.

original: de ltar na yang sngon gyi dus la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i mngon sum du gyur par mi 'os la /
analyzed: de ltar na yang sngon gyi dus la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i mngon sum du gyur par mi 'os la /
translated: Even so, it is not suitable for it to be a direct perception related to the past and so on.

original: dran pa med na yang de nyid 'di yin no snyam par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dran pa med na yang de nyid 'di yin no snyam par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: If there is no memory, one will not think, “That is the same as this.”

original: mngon sum med na dran pa'i dri yang med pas na /
analyzed: mngon sum med na dran pa'i dri yang med pas na /
translated: And if there is no direct perception, there will not even be the trace of memory.

original: bdag snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la khyab par mngon sum las mi 'grub po //
analyzed: bdag snga ma dang phyi ma'i dus la khyab par mngon sum las mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, the self is not established by direct perception as being pervasive in the past and future.

original: gzhan yang bdag gis shes par gyur to //
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gis shes par gyur to //
translated: Moreover, the thought “I knew it in the past”

original: da lta bdag gis shes so snyam pa 'di la ni shes pa yang bsal la /
analyzed: da lta bdag gis shes so snyam pa 'di la ni shes pa yang bsal la /
translated: and the thought “I know it now” are eliminated by the knowledge

original: de yang dpyod pa pa'i grub mtha' ltar na mngon sum ma yin na /
analyzed: de yang dpyod pa pa'i grub mtha' ltar na mngon sum ma yin na /
translated: that if, according to the tenets of the Analysts, it is not a direct perception,

original: mngon dang phyi ma'i shes pa dang 'brel pa can gyi shes pa po mngon sum gyis ji ltar grub ces pa ma rig go //
analyzed: mngon dang phyi ma'i shes pa dang 'brel pa can gyi shes pa po mngon sum gyis ji ltar grub ces pa ma rig go //
translated: How is the cognizer related to the cognition of the present and the future established by perception?

original: des na de ltar ngo shes pa mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar ngo shes pa mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, recognition is not perception in this way.

original: rtags las ma skyes pas na rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir log pa'i shes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rtags las ma skyes pas na rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir log pa'i shes pa kho na'o //
translated: Since it is not produced from a reason, it is also not inference. Therefore, it is only a mistaken cognition.

original: log pa'i shes pa ni bdag med pa'i gnod byed du mi rigs shing /
analyzed: log pa'i shes pa ni bdag med pa'i gnod byed du mi rigs shing /
translated: A mistaken cognition is not suitable to be a refutation of selflessness.

original: 'di la rgal zhing brtag pa legs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la rgal zhing brtag pa legs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not good to refute and investigate this.

original: 'di la don dam par na yul 'ga' yang med la /
analyzed: 'di la don dam par na yul 'ga' yang med la /
translated: In this regard, ultimately, there is no object at all.

original: mngon par rlom pa'i dbang gis ni phung po lnga'i yul can kho na ste /
analyzed: mngon par rlom pa'i dbang gis ni phung po lnga'i yul can kho na ste /
translated: However, by the power of manifest clinging, there is only the object of the five aggregates.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i yul ci yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i yul ci yin /
translated: Therefore, what is the object of this?

original: shes pa snga ma'i skad cig yin nam /
analyzed: shes pa snga ma'i skad cig yin nam /
translated: Is it the moment of the previous cognition?

original: 'on te da lta yod pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te da lta yod pa yin nam /
translated: Or is it the present one?

original: 'on te gnyis yin nam /
analyzed: 'on te gnyis yin nam /
translated: Or is it both?

original: 'on te rgyud yin zhes rnam par brtags nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te rgyud yin zhes rnam par brtags nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa ni 'brel pa med pa yin no //
translated: Or is it the continuum? Having investigated in this way, the expression of refutation is irrelevant.

original: gal te 'di log pa'i shes pa yul med pa yin na thams cad du ci'i phyir mi 'jug ce na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'di log pa'i shes pa yul med pa yin na thams cad du ci'i phyir mi 'jug ce na ma yin te /
translated: If this is a non-existent object, why does it not engage in everything?

original: 'du byed kha cig kho na la de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kha cig kho na la de lta bur gyur pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not so, because some compounded phenomena have the ability to generate such a consciousness.

original: de skad du slob dpon zhi ba  'tsho'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: de skad du slob dpon zhi ba  'tsho'i zhal snga nas /
translated: As stated by Master Śāntarakṣita:

original: 'du byed 'ga' zhig kho na ni //🔽de yi ngo bo'i zhen pa la //
analyzed: 'du byed 'ga' zhig kho na ni // de yi ngo bo'i zhen pa la //
translated: Some compounded phenomena🔽Are the dominant condition

original: bdag po nyid du 'gyur ba yin //🔽des na kun 'jug ma yin na //
analyzed: bdag po nyid du 'gyur ba yin // des na kun 'jug ma yin na //
translated: For the conception of their nature.

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽gang yang bdag rjes su dpog pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o // gang yang bdag rjes su dpog pa /
translated: Therefore it does not engage all.

original: gzugs la sogs @57b pa'i shes pa ni rgyu mtshan gcig pa can yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs @57b pa'i shes pa ni rgyu mtshan gcig pa can yin te /
translated: Also, the consciousness of form and so on is the same reason for inferring the self,

original: bdag gis byed ces bya ba'i shes pas mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: bdag gis byed ces bya ba'i shes pas mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir na /
translated: because the consciousness that thinks “I do this” connects with it.

original: dus mtshungs pa'i skyes bu du ma'i gar mkhan mo'i smin ma bskyod pa shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de yang rtags ma nges pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa'i skyes bu du ma'i gar mkhan mo'i smin ma bskyod pa shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba de yang rtags ma nges pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not a proof because the reason is not ascertained.

original: 'di ltar mtshams sbyor ba yang yin la rgyu mtshan gcig pa can ma yin no zhes bya ba la 'gal ba ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshams sbyor ba yang yin la rgyu mtshan gcig pa can ma yin no zhes bya ba la 'gal ba ma mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, it is not seen to be contradictory to say that it is a link and it does not have the same reason.

original: gal te mtshams sbyor ba rgyu mtshan gcig pa can du nges par grub pa yin na de las shes pa rnams rgyu mtshan gcig pa can yin pa zhig na /
analyzed: gal te mtshams sbyor ba rgyu mtshan gcig pa can du nges par grub pa yin na de las shes pa rnams rgyu mtshan gcig pa can yin pa zhig na /
translated: If it were established that the link is definitely the same reason, then the cognitions would be the same reason.

original: de ni 'gar yang grub pa med do //
analyzed: de ni 'gar yang grub pa med do //
translated: But that is not established anywhere.

original: smin ma bskyod pa gcig gi yul can rnams la grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: smin ma bskyod pa gcig gi yul can rnams la grub bo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is established in the case of those who have the same object, the movement of a single eyebrow,

original: grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not established.

original: gal te mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa kha cig rgyu mtshan gcig pa can du mthong mod kyi /
analyzed: gal te mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa kha cig rgyu mtshan gcig pa can du mthong mod kyi /
translated: If you say that some of the linking cognitions are seen to have the same reason,

original: 'on kyang de ltar gyur pa thams cad de 'dra ba yin no zhes bya ba gang las te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de ltar gyur pa thams cad de 'dra ba yin no zhes bya ba gang las te /
translated: but that all that occur in that way are similar, then where is that established?

original: bzlog pa la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa la gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no valid cognition that contradicts that.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis mthong ngo bdag gis thos so snyam du lta ba dang nyan pa dag gis byed pa po gcig nyid du nges pa'i shes pa skye la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis mthong ngo bdag gis thos so snyam du lta ba dang nyan pa dag gis byed pa po gcig nyid du nges pa'i shes pa skye la /
translated: Thus, when one sees and hears, the cognition that ascertains the one who sees and hears is produced.

original: de ni dus tha dad pa'am dus tha mi dad pa de dag gis byed pa po gcig nyid du mthong ba'am rjes su dpag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de ni dus tha dad pa'am dus tha mi dad pa de dag gis byed pa po gcig nyid du mthong ba'am rjes su dpag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang ma yin la /
translated: That is not seen or inferred by those who are different or not different in time to be one who sees or hears.

original: rang gis mthong ba'am rjes su dpog pa yang ma yin na ;
analyzed: rang gis mthong ba'am rjes su dpog pa yang ma yin na ;
translated: Nor is it seen or inferred by oneself.

original: tshad ma can ma yin zhing tshad ma yang ma yin pa'i zhen pas nges pa'i dngos po las 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba gang las yin /
analyzed: tshad ma can ma yin zhing tshad ma yang ma yin pa'i zhen pas nges pa'i dngos po las 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba gang las yin /
translated: What is the basis for saying that it is not beyond the nature of that which is ascertained by the nonvalid cognition that is not a valid cognition?

original: rgyu mtshan sna tshogs pa la mtshams sbyor ba ma mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan sna tshogs pa la mtshams sbyor ba ma mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not seen to be connected to various reasons,

original: gal te ma mthong ba de lta na yang the tshom mi bzlog ste /
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba de lta na yang the tshom mi bzlog ste /
translated: then even if it is not seen, doubt is not eliminated.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because mere non-apprehension is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: / rgyu mtshan tha dad pa la yang mtshams sbyor ba dmigs pa kho na ste /
analyzed: / rgyu mtshan tha dad pa la yang mtshams sbyor ba dmigs pa kho na ste /
translated: Even in the case of different reasons, there is a connection of the apprehension,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis sgron ma gang zhig srod la mthong ba de kho na da lta nam phyed na yang snang ngo zhes snga ma dang / phyi ma'i mthong ba dag mtshams sbyor ba yod kyang rgyu mtshan gcig pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis sgron ma gang zhig srod la mthong ba de kho na da lta nam phyed na yang snang ngo zhes snga ma dang / phyi ma'i mthong ba dag mtshams sbyor ba yod kyang rgyu mtshan gcig pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is like this: “I saw that lamp at dusk, and now at midnight it is still shining,” although there is a connection between the earlier and later seeing, they do not have the same reason.

original: byed pa po gcig yin pas na 'khrul pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po gcig yin pas na 'khrul pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no error because there is one agent,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: yul tha dad pa las bsams nas 'khrul pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa las bsams nas 'khrul pa brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because error is stated with reference to different objects.

original: mtshams sbyor ba 'dis ni byed pa po bzhin du las kyang gcig nyid du mtshams sbyor la /
analyzed: mtshams sbyor ba 'dis ni byed pa po bzhin du las kyang gcig nyid du mtshams sbyor la /
translated: By this connection, just as the agent is one, so too the action is connected as one.

original: de la las la ltos nas 'khrul pa bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: de la las la ltos nas 'khrul pa bzlog par dka'o //
translated: And in that case, it is difficult to refute error in dependence on the action.

original: 'dir re zhig rgyu mtshan gcig pa can nyid @58a * //
analyzed: 'dir re zhig rgyu mtshan gcig pa can nyid @58a * //
translated: Here, first, there is the same reason,

original: yod de ; des na bzlog par sla'o zhe na /
analyzed: yod de ; des na bzlog par sla'o zhe na /
translated: and therefore it is easy to refute.

original: byed pa po gcig pa tsam gyis shes pa rnams kyi yul tha mi dad par zhen pa'i mtshams sbyor ba khas len na /
analyzed: byed pa po gcig pa tsam gyis shes pa rnams kyi yul tha mi dad par zhen pa'i mtshams sbyor ba khas len na /
translated: If you accept that the mere sameness of the agent is the link for the conception that the objects of consciousnesses are not different,

original: yul tha dad pa'i tha snyad dang bral bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa'i tha snyad dang bral bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it follows, absurdly, that you would be free of the convention of different objects.

original: des na 'di ni ldog pa la the tshom za ba dang thun mong ba nyid kyi sgo nas kyang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
analyzed: des na 'di ni ldog pa la the tshom za ba dang thun mong ba nyid kyi sgo nas kyang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhing /
translated: Therefore this is an inconclusive reason because of the doubt about the contrapositive and because of the common locus.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs ltar na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lugs ltar na /
translated: According to the Yogacara

original: dpe ma grub pas thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas kyang yin no //
analyzed: dpe ma grub pas thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas kyang yin no //
translated: it is also inconclusive because the example is not established.

original: ma nges pa'i rtags ni rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag ma yin zhing /
analyzed: ma nges pa'i rtags ni rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag ma yin zhing /
translated: An inconclusive reason is not a part of an inference.

original: tshul gsum nges pa can gyi bdag gis sgrub byed gzhan yang med pas na /
analyzed: tshul gsum nges pa can gyi bdag gis sgrub byed gzhan yang med pas na /
translated: Since there is no other proof that has the three criteria ascertained,

original: thog ma med pa nas log par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis dbang du byas pa'i yid can rnams kyi bdag tu rtog pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan med pa yin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa nas log par rtog pa'i bag chags kyis dbang du byas pa'i yid can rnams kyi bdag tu rtog pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan med pa yin no //
translated: the conception of self by those whose minds are controlled by the latent potentialities of beginningless false views is without a cause.

original: 'di las kyang rgyu mtshan med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di las kyang rgyu mtshan med pa yin te /
translated: This is also without a cause.

original: 'di'i yul bkag pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i yul bkag pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The object of that is refuted.

original: bems po dang bems po ma yin pa'i shes pa po ma yin pa'i shes pa po gcig sun 'byin pas yul 'gog pa blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: bems po dang bems po ma yin pa'i shes pa po ma yin pa'i shes pa po gcig sun 'byin pas yul 'gog pa blta bar bya ste /
translated: The refutation of the object should be seen as the refutation of a single cognizer that is both an insentient thing and not an insentient thing.

original: ha cang thal bas chog go //
analyzed: ha cang thal bas chog go //
translated: Enough with this overabundance!

original: de lta na re zhig phyogs gnyis pa mi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na re zhig phyogs gnyis pa mi rigs pa yin no //
translated: Thus the second position is unreasonable.

original: gsum pa yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: gsum pa yang mi rigs te /
translated: The third position is also unreasonable.

original: gcig yin na sna tshogs nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽rnam par shes pa gcig las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa ga la yin zhing /
analyzed: gcig yin na sna tshogs nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro // rnam par shes pa gcig las tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa ga la yin zhing /
translated: If it is one, it is contradictory for it to be a diversity.🔽How could there be a diversity of aspects that are not different from a single consciousness?

original: rnam pa sna tshogs dang tha dad med pa'i shes pa gcig ga la yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs dang tha dad med pa'i shes pa gcig ga la yin te /
translated: How could there be a single consciousness that is not different from a diversity of aspects?

original: shes las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not different from consciousness,

original: rnam pa mang por mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: rnam pa mang por mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: it does not become manifold.

original: rnam pa las ni gzhan min phyir //
analyzed: rnam pa las ni gzhan min phyir //
translated: Because it is not different from the aspects,

original: yang na shes pa du mar 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na shes pa du mar 'gyur //
translated: consciousness becomes manifold.

original: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is explained.

original: ji ste kun rdzob tu rnam pa sna tshogs su brjod pa yin la ;
analyzed: ji ste kun rdzob tu rnam pa sna tshogs su brjod pa yin la ;
translated: If it is said that the diversity of aspects is described conventionally,

original: don dam par de gnyis su med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: don dam par de gnyis su med pa kho na ste /
translated: In reality, they are not different.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: yang na sna tshogs ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir zhes bshad do zhe na /
analyzed: yang na sna tshogs ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir zhes bshad do zhe na /
translated: Or, because it does not appear as different from the non-diverse.

original: gal te de ltar yin na yang de gnyis med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na yang de gnyis med pa ma yin te /
translated: But even if that were so, they are not non-existent,🔽because they do not appear as different from the two.

original: gnyis las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / yang na de shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / yang na de shes pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, it must be said that it is not cognition,

original: shes pa ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not appear as different from non-cognition.

original: yang na de rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na de rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, it must be said that it is not logical,

original: rigs pa ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar yang brjod dgos so //
analyzed: rigs pa ma yin pa las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar yang brjod dgos so //
translated: because it does not appear as different from non-logic.

original: don dam par de lta bu kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don dam par de lta bu kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that in reality it is just like that,

original: 'o na cung zad kyang brjod du med pas na lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na cung zad kyang brjod du med pas na lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then since nothing at all can be said, you are reduced to dumbness.

original: rang @58b gis kyang cung zad kyang rnam par gzhag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: rang @58b gis kyang cung zad kyang rnam par gzhag par mi bya ste /
translated: You should not posit anything at all,

original: der yang rigs pa'i 'di mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der yang rigs pa'i 'di mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the same logic applies there.

original: brjod pa'i kun rdzob kyis 'di thams cad brjod par bya ba yin zhing rnam par gzhag par bya ba yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa'i kun rdzob kyis 'di thams cad brjod par bya ba yin zhing rnam par gzhag par bya ba yang yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that all of this is expressible and is also established by the conventional of expression,

original: 'o na sna tshogs pa nyid du yang brjod cing rnam par gzhag par yang gyis shig / de brjod pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag dang tha dad pa'i brjod pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag kyang dgag par mi 'os so //
analyzed: 'o na sna tshogs pa nyid du yang brjod cing rnam par gzhag par yang gyis shig / de brjod pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag dang tha dad pa'i brjod pa dang rnam par gzhag pa dag kyang dgag par mi 'os so //
translated: then express it as manifold and also establish it as manifold. It is not right to deny the expressions and the establishments that are different from those expressions and establishments.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not different because there is no valid cognition that establishes it,

original: de lta na sna tshogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de lta na sna tshogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: then it will not be manifold.

original: tha mi dad par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it will not be non-different,

original: de las yang sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las yang sgrub par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no establishment of it.

original: ngo bo tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i blo ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i blo ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no cognition that apprehends it as non-different in essence,

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: as it is said:

original: dngos mthong med phyir gcig ma yin //
analyzed: dngos mthong med phyir gcig ma yin //
translated: Because the entity is not seen without it, it is not one.

original: blo dngos tha dad med mthong bas //
analyzed: blo dngos tha dad med mthong bas //
translated: Because the cognition is seen as not different from the entity,

original: tha dad med par nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad med par nges par 'gyur //
translated: it is ascertained as not different.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: tha dad med par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir tha dad pa grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad med par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir tha dad pa grub bo zhe na /
translated: If you say that they are established as different because they are not apprehended as non-different,

original: tha dad med par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir tha dad par ci'i phyir mi 'grub /
analyzed: tha dad med par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir tha dad par ci'i phyir mi 'grub /
translated: why are they not established as different because they are not apprehended as different?

original: tha dad pa yin na phan tshun lkog tu gyur par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na phan tshun lkog tu gyur par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If they are different, they would be mutually hidden.

original: tha dad na yang sna tshogs dang 'gal ba rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad na yang sna tshogs dang 'gal ba rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are different, the variety would be reduced to one aspect.

original: tha dad par sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa yang ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa yang ma grub pa yin te /
translated: The non-establishment of the non-existence of a valid cognition establishing difference is also not established,

original: mngon sum nyid kyis tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyis tha dad par grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because difference is established by perception itself.

original: 'di 'di las tha dad do zhes ma rtogs pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na /🔽'o na rang gi ngo bo yin no zhes mi rtogs pas na mngon sum gyis mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: 'di 'di las tha dad do zhes ma rtogs pa'i phyir de lta ma yin no zhe na / 'o na rang gi ngo bo yin no zhes mi rtogs pas na mngon sum gyis mi 'grub bo //
translated: If you say that is not so because one does not understand that this is different from that,🔽then since one does not understand that it is its own nature, it is not established by perception.

original: rnam par mi rtog kyang rang gi ngo bo snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog kyang rang gi ngo bo snang ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that its own nature appears even without conceptualization,

original: 'di ni tha dad pa la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni tha dad pa la yang mtshungs so //
translated: this is the same even if they are different.

original: du ma dmigs pa yin no tha dad par snang ba yin te /
analyzed: du ma dmigs pa yin no tha dad par snang ba yin te /
translated: If you say, “Many are observed, they are different because they appear to be different,”

original: des na de med na mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: des na de med na mi 'byung ngo zhe na /
translated: then if they do not exist, they would not arise.

original: de ci khyed rta la zhon nas rta brjed dam /
analyzed: de ci khyed rta la zhon nas rta brjed dam /
translated: Do you forget the horse you are riding when you say that?

original: rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi shes pa gcig yin par smra ba yin la /
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi shes pa gcig yin par smra ba yin la /
translated: You assert that consciousness that has various aspects is one.

original: kho bo cag kyang de nyid tha dad par sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: kho bo cag kyang de nyid tha dad par sgrub pa yin no //
translated: We also prove that it is different.

original: des na du ma ma gzung ba'i phyir tha dad par mi 'dzin no zhes bya ba'i lan 'di gang du 'brel par 'gyur /🔽de lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du rig pa'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa tha dad par 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: des na du ma ma gzung ba'i phyir tha dad par mi 'dzin no zhes bya ba'i lan 'di gang du 'brel par 'gyur / de lta bur gyur pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du rig pa'i khongs su 'dus pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa tha dad par 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how could this response be relevant: “Because many are not apprehended, they are not apprehended as different”?🔽If it is included in the category of awareness of that kind of essential nature, it is contradictory that it is different.

original: des las bzlog pa'i ngo bo can yang des tha mi dad pa 'gal ba kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: des las bzlog pa'i ngo bo can yang des tha mi dad pa 'gal ba kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it contradictory that it is not different from that which has an essential nature that is the opposite of that?

original: dngos po la rnam pa gzhan med do //🔽'o na de ltar na dngos po med @59a * //
analyzed: dngos po la rnam pa gzhan med do // 'o na de ltar na dngos po med @59a * //
translated: There is no other aspect of an entity.

original: pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Well, in that case, it would become a nonentity.

original: gzhan dmigs kyang dngos po gzhan gyi ngo bos tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dmigs kyang dngos po gzhan gyi ngo bos tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if something else is observed, it is not different from the entity of something else.

original: tha dad pa 'di tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa 'di tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because difference is not different from difference.

original: tha dad pa yin na dngos po'i 'chol bas na de med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na dngos po'i 'chol bas na de med pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were different, then because of the confusion of entities, it would follow that it does not exist.

original: de yang tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha dad pa gzhan khas len na thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang tha dad pa las tha mi dad pa'i phyir tha dad pa gzhan khas len na thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because that is not different from difference, if you accept another difference, there would be an infinite regress.

original: rang gi ngo bos tha dad na dngos po gzhan dmigs pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos tha dad na dngos po gzhan dmigs pas ci zhig bya /
translated: If it is different by its own nature, what is the use of observing another entity?

original: de ni 'di 'di las tha dad do snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye ba tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni 'di 'di las tha dad do snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye ba tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin gyi /
translated: It is only necessary for the conception “This is different from that” to arise.

original: de'i ngo bo mngon sum du byed pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo mngon sum du byed pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not necessary for its nature to be directly perceived.

original: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma dang phyi ma dag lhan cig dmigs pa med kyang tha dad par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir snga ma dang phyi ma dag lhan cig dmigs pa med kyang tha dad par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: For that very reason, even though the prior and subsequent are not observed simultaneously, they are still different.

original: dmigs pa ma dmigs pa las tha dad par ji ltar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: dmigs pa ma dmigs pa las tha dad par ji ltar 'grub ce na /
translated: How is it established that difference is from the nonobservation of the observed?

original: de nyid kyi phyir na rnam pa gzhan du na dmigs pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na rnam pa gzhan du na dmigs pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, in no other way is the object established.

original: de lta bas na dmigs par 'grub la /
analyzed: de lta bas na dmigs par 'grub la /
translated: Thus, the object is established.

original: snga ma ni dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no zhe na ;
analyzed: snga ma ni dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no zhe na ;
translated: But the former is neither an object nor a non-object.

original: de lta na yang tha dad pa grub pa mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de lta na yang tha dad pa grub pa mi 'gal lo //
translated: Even so, the establishment of difference is not contradicted.

original: de ni mi rtogs pa de las tha dad par ni rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de ni mi rtogs pa de las tha dad par ni rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: But it is contradictory to say that it is not cognized as different from that.

original: 'di la nyams pa cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: 'di la nyams pa cung zad kyang med de /
translated: There is no fault in this.

original: 'gal zlas rtogs pa la de las gzhan pa de'i bdag nyid du ma rtogs pa nyid de las tha dad par rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'gal zlas rtogs pa la de las gzhan pa de'i bdag nyid du ma rtogs pa nyid de las tha dad par rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The cognition of the contradictory is the non-cognition of that as having the same nature as that, and the cognition of it as different from that.

original: de ni de ma rtogs kyang nyams pa med pas na tha dad pa rtogs pa la dgos pa med do //
analyzed: de ni de ma rtogs kyang nyams pa med pas na tha dad pa rtogs pa la dgos pa med do //
translated: And that is not a fault, even if it is not cognized as that, so there is no purpose in the cognition of difference.

original: de ni ma rtogs pa de las tha dad par rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di nyid 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma rtogs pa de las tha dad par rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di nyid 'gal ba yin te /
translated: This is contradictory to the statement that it is cognized as different from that which is not cognized.

original: gcig yin na mi rtogs pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig yin na mi rtogs pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it is one, it is not tenable that it is not cognized.

original: gnyis su med par smra ba 'di ni tha snyad 'dogs pa rnams la nye bar mkho ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis su med par smra ba 'di ni tha snyad 'dogs pa rnams la nye bar mkho ba ma yin te /
translated: This nondualism is not necessary for those who posit conventions,

original: tha dad thams cad ni blang bya dang dor bya nyid kyi sgo nas tha dad pa'i rten can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad thams cad ni blang bya dang dor bya nyid kyi sgo nas tha dad pa'i rten can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all differences are based on the distinction between what is to be taken up and what is to be rejected.

original: gnyis su med par smra ba ni grol bar 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyis su med par smra ba ni grol bar 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is nondualism necessary for those who seek liberation,

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag kyang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because cyclic existence and nirvana are not different.

original: srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
translated: Existence and nonexistence,

original: gnyis po 'di ni yod min te //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di ni yod min te //
translated: these two do not exist.

original: srid pa yongs su shes pa nyid //
analyzed: srid pa yongs su shes pa nyid //
translated: The thorough knowledge of existence

original: mya ngan 'das pa zhes byar brjod //🔽zhes pa ltar yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa zhes byar brjod // zhes pa ltar yin no zhe na /
translated: is called nirvana.

original: de yang mi bden te /
analyzed: de yang mi bden te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: de kho na shes pa yang /
analyzed: de kho na shes pa yang /
translated: The knowledge of reality

original: cig shos yang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig shos yang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not different from the other.

original: des na 'di nye bar mkho ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin pas na mkhas pa rnams @59b 'di la ji ltar mngon par zhen zhes mi rigs so //
analyzed: des na 'di nye bar mkho ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin pas na mkhas pa rnams @59b 'di la ji ltar mngon par zhen zhes mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, since it is not useful, how can the wise be attached to it?

original: bshad pa mdzad pas ni shes rab phul du byung ba dang ldan pas rloms te gsungs pas rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul sgrub pa na de skad gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa mdzad pas ni shes rab phul du byung ba dang ldan pas rloms te gsungs pas rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul sgrub pa na de skad gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The author of the commentary, being proud of his excellent wisdom, said this in order to establish the Yogācāra system.

original: sna tshogs gnyis su med pa kho na rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no //
analyzed: sna tshogs gnyis su med pa kho na rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no //
translated: The nonduality of diversity is the refuge of the Yogācāra.

original: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam pa med par smra ba ni tha chad yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam pa med par smra ba ni tha chad yin la /
translated: Thus, the proponents of consciousness without aspects are inferior.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa yin pa na yang gal te sna tshogs gnyis su med pa la sdang na /
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa yin pa na yang gal te sna tshogs gnyis su med pa la sdang na /
translated: Even if they have aspects, if they hate the nonduality of diversity,

original: gang du yang gcig nyid rnam par mi gnas te /
analyzed: gang du yang gcig nyid rnam par mi gnas te /
translated: then nowhere does singularity remain.

original: de ltar dkar po la sogs pa //
analyzed: de ltar dkar po la sogs pa //
translated: Thus, white and so on🔽are observed as diverse

original: rig pa rnam pa gcig la ni //🔽thog ma bar mtha'i bye brag gis//
analyzed: rig pa rnam pa gcig la ni // thog ma bar mtha'i bye brag gis//
translated: in a single cognition

original: sna tshogs nyid du dmigs pa yin //
analyzed: sna tshogs nyid du dmigs pa yin //
translated: through the differences of beginning, middle, and end.

original: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab yongs su rtogs pa yang yang dag par rigs pa med pa'i phyir sdig pa las kyang sdig pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rdul phra rab yongs su rtogs pa yang yang dag par rigs pa med pa'i phyir sdig pa las kyang sdig pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the atom of consciousness is also a sin, because it is a sin that is not logically possible.

original: spros pas chog go //
analyzed: spros pas chog go //
translated: Enough with the elaboration!

original: phyogs bzhi pa la brten pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs bzhi pa la brten pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is also not logical to rely on the fourth position,

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa brdzun pa yin na gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa brdzun pa yin na gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the aspect of the apprehended is false, clarity is not tenable.

original: de ltar na shes pa gsal ba kho na gsal ba yin nam /
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa gsal ba kho na gsal ba yin nam /
translated: In that case, is the clarity of consciousness only clarity?

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yin grang na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa yin grang na /
translated: Or is it not of the nature of that?

original: phyogs dang po ltar shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs dang po ltar shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the first case, it would be the nature of consciousness itself.

original: shes pa'i gsal ba mi gsal ba las log pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de /
analyzed: shes pa'i gsal ba mi gsal ba las log pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de /
translated: The essence of the clarity of consciousness, which is the opposite of unclarity,

original: gal te gzung ba'i rnam pa la yod na /
analyzed: gal te gzung ba'i rnam pa la yod na /
translated: if it exists in the aspect of the apprehended,

original: su zhig de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog par byed /
analyzed: su zhig de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog par byed /
translated: who would refute that it is of the nature of that?

original: gnyis pa ltar na gud du gsal bas na shes pa bzhin gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis pa ltar na gud du gsal bas na shes pa bzhin gzhan nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: In the second case, it would be different from consciousness, because it is clearly separate.

original: gsal ba ni shes pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba ni shes pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because clarity is a property of consciousness.

original: gang yang gzung ba'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir de la ltos pas 'dzin pa yang med do zhes brjod pa de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang gzung ba'i rnam pa med pa'i phyir de la ltos pas 'dzin pa yang med do zhes brjod pa de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, it is not correct to say that the apprehended does not exist because the aspect of the apprehended does not exist, and that the apprehender does not exist because it depends on that.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yin yang 'dzin pa don dam pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yin yang 'dzin pa don dam pa nyid yin te /
translated: Although there is an apprehended and an apprehender, the apprehender is the ultimate.

original: med pa gsal ba'i nus pa ma rig pa'i bdag nyid ni shes pa'i ngo bo yin pas na /
analyzed: med pa gsal ba'i nus pa ma rig pa'i bdag nyid ni shes pa'i ngo bo yin pas na /
translated: The power of the nonexistence of the apprehended is the nature of consciousness, and therefore

original: de med na de yang med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na de yang med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: if the apprehended does not exist, it follows that the apprehender also does not exist.

original: phyogs lnga pa la brten pa yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs lnga pa la brten pa yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: Also, the fifth position is not good,

original: shes pa ni gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir de med na yod pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa ni gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir de med na yod pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if consciousness is the nature of clarity, it is contradictory for it to exist if that does not exist.

original: ji ste de ni gsal ba kho na ste mi nges par zad do zhe na /🔽ma nges na gsal lo zhes bya ba ga las /
analyzed: ji ste de ni gsal ba kho na ste mi nges par zad do zhe na / ma nges na gsal lo zhes bya ba ga las /
translated: If it is said that it is only clarity, but it is not ascertained,🔽then if it is not ascertained, how can it be said to be clear?

original: gzhan du na kun tu brtags pa gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du na kun tu brtags pa gsal ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is not tenable that the imagined is clear,

original: gal te gsal ba na kun @60a * //
analyzed: gal te gsal ba na kun @60a * //
translated: if it is clear, then it is not imagined.

original: tu brtags pa gsal ba mthong na rjes su dpag pa 'dir 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: tu brtags pa gsal ba mthong na rjes su dpag pa 'dir 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But if it is clearly perceived, then this is not an inference.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: nam yang de gsal bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam yang de gsal bar nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is never ascertained that it is clearly perceived.

original: gsal ba'i chos can ni nam yang ji ltar yang ma nges pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i chos can ni nam yang ji ltar yang ma nges pa mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable that a clearly perceived property-possessor is never ascertained in any way.

original: 'di ltar sems don gzhan la zhugs pa 'gro ba na rtsa la sogs pa la reg kyang mi nges pa de lta na yang mthong ba gzhan la nges par byed pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems don gzhan la zhugs pa 'gro ba na rtsa la sogs pa la reg kyang mi nges pa de lta na yang mthong ba gzhan la nges par byed pa kho na yin la /
translated: Thus, when the mind is engaged with another object, even though one touches grass, etc., it is not ascertained, but it is only ascertained in another perception.

original: sngon po la sogs pa dmigs par gyur pa skad cig ma nyid du ma nges kyang sngon po'i bdag nyid du zhen pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa dmigs par gyur pa skad cig ma nyid du ma nges kyang sngon po'i bdag nyid du zhen pa kho na'o //
translated: Even though the perception of blue, etc. is not ascertained as momentary, it is only ascertained as the nature of blue.

original: gal te gang zhig ngo bo gang du yang nam yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin pa de yang gsal na thams cad la thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gang zhig ngo bo gang du yang nam yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin pa de yang gsal na thams cad la thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that which is never to be inferred in any way as any nature is also clearly perceived, then everything would be clearly perceived in every way.

original: gal te der de lta bu gang yang gsal ba mi bzod na /
analyzed: gal te der de lta bu gang yang gsal ba mi bzod na /
translated: But if it is not able to bear such a clear perception in that way,🔽then it is not clearly perceived.

original: de la yang bzod par mi bya'o zhes nges so //
analyzed: de la yang bzod par mi bya'o zhes nges so //
translated: And it is certain that one should not be patient with that.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams la nges pa yang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams la nges pa yang ngo zhe na /
translated: But it is certain for the yogis.

original: re zhig tshe 'di la ni gang la yang ma dmigs la gnas skabs der son pa rnams kyis ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: re zhig tshe 'di la ni gang la yang ma dmigs la gnas skabs der son pa rnams kyis ni ma gtogs so //
translated: For the time being, it is not observed in any way, except for those who have reached that stage.

original: gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i nges pa brtags nas yod yod pa'i tha snyad 'dogs na nam yang snang ba gang yang med pa'i tha snyad du mi bya bar 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ba'i nges pa brtags nas yod yod pa'i tha snyad 'dogs na nam yang snang ba gang yang med pa'i tha snyad du mi bya bar 'gyur bas na /
translated: Moreover, if one were to make the conventional designation of existence by examining the certainty of the yogis who will arise in the future, then one would never make the conventional designation of non-existence.

original: 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: This is absurd.

original: gang yang kun rdzob gzhi med pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang yang kun rdzob gzhi med pa mi 'thad do zhes brjod pa de yang mi rigs te /
translated: Moreover, it is not tenable that the conventional has no basis.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa dag nye bar blang bya dang nye bar len pa'i ngo bor ma rtogs shing /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa dag nye bar blang bya dang nye bar len pa'i ngo bor ma rtogs shing /
translated: That which is not a cause and effect is not realized to be the nature of that which is to be taken up and that which takes it up.

original: 'bras bu yin na yang kun rdzob tu ma rtogs so //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin na yang kun rdzob tu ma rtogs so //
translated: Even if it is an effect, it is not realized conventionally.

original: kun rdzob kyi gzhi kun rdzob kho na yin pas na dbu ma pa kho na la de gzhi dang bcas par mthong ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi gzhi kun rdzob kho na yin pas na dbu ma pa kho na la de gzhi dang bcas par mthong ste /
translated: Since the basis of the conventional is only the conventional, only the Madhyamikas see it as having a basis.

original: gang du smra bas chog go //
analyzed: gang du smra bas chog go //
translated: Enough of this discussion!

original: de ltar shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa dpyad mi bzod cing rnam pa gzhan yang med pas 'di kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid rigs pa'i stobs las 'ong ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar shes pa rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa dpyad mi bzod cing rnam pa gzhan yang med pas 'di kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid rigs pa'i stobs las 'ong ba yin no //
translated: Thus, since consciousness, whether with or without aspects, cannot withstand analysis and there is no other alternative, it is reasonable to conclude that all this exists only conventionally.

original: sbyor ba ni de kho nar med pa'i khyab byed can gyis chos gang yin pa de ni de kho nar med pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni de kho nar med pa'i khyab byed can gyis chos gang yin pa de ni de kho nar med pa yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is pervaded by nonexistence in reality is nonexistent in reality,

original: dper na rtag pa de kho nar med pa'i nus pa'i ngo bo gcig pu'i rang bzhin khyab par byed pa can gyi chos yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rtag pa de kho nar med pa'i nus pa'i ngo bo gcig pu'i rang bzhin khyab par byed pa can gyi chos yin pa bzhin no //
translated: like the nature of a potency, which is pervaded by the single nature of nonexistence in reality.

original: rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa'i bdag nyid de kho nar med pa'i khyab par byed pa can gyi chos yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa'i bdag nyid de kho nar med pa'i khyab par byed pa can gyi chos yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is pervaded by the property of being nonexistent just as it is, with or without aspects. This is nonobservation of the pervader.

original: 'di ma grub pa yin pa ni spangs @60b zin pa nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ma grub pa yin pa ni spangs @60b zin pa nyid yin zhing /
translated: That this is not established has already been refuted.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pas 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it contradictory because it exists in the similar class.

original: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo yin pas na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo yin pas na /
translated: Since there is no other possibility, it is the nature of the pervader and the pervaded.

original: khyab par byed pa med na khyab par bya ba yod pa mi 'thad pas na ma nges pa nyid kyang rgyang bsrings pa yin no //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa med na khyab par bya ba yod pa mi 'thad pas na ma nges pa nyid kyang rgyang bsrings pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is not tenable that the pervaded exists when the pervader does not exist, the uncertainty is also eliminated.

original: des na khyab par byed pa 'dis grub pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis khas blang bar 'os so //
analyzed: des na khyab par byed pa 'dis grub pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis khas blang bar 'os so //
translated: Therefore, the wise should accept whatever is established by this pervader.

original: ji ste phyi rol gyi don sun phyung ste rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhag pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de kho na yin pa spong ba'i dbu ma pa rnams de kho na ji lta bu zhig tu lta zhe na /🔽yod min med min yod med min //
analyzed: ji ste phyi rol gyi don sun phyung ste rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhag pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de kho na yin pa spong ba'i dbu ma pa rnams de kho na ji lta bu zhig tu lta zhe na / yod min med min yod med min //
translated: But if one refutes external objects and the consciousness posited by the Yogacaras, what is the suchness that the Madhyamikas, who reject that, view?🔽It is not existent, not nonexistent,🔽not both, nor even not both.

original: gnyi ga min pa'i bdag nyid min //🔽de nyid mtha' bzhi las grol ba //
analyzed: gnyi ga min pa'i bdag nyid min // de nyid mtha' bzhi las grol ba //
translated: That itself is the suchness

original: dbu ma pa yis rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: dbu ma pa yis rtogs pa yin //
translated: that is realized by the Madhyamikas, who are free from the four extremes.🔽The four extremes are

original: mtha' bzhi ste /
analyzed: mtha' bzhi ste /
translated: the four possibilities:

original: rnam pa bzhi las grol ba'i de kho na dbu ma'i sgrub pas spyod pa rnams kyi rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi las grol ba'i de kho na dbu ma'i sgrub pas spyod pa rnams kyi rigs pa yin no //
translated: The suchness that is free from those four extremes is the suchness that is realized by the Madhyamikas, who are free from the four extremes.

original: 'di ltar yod min te /🔽yod pa'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod min te / yod pa'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not existent,

original: shes pa dang shes bya gnyi ga yod pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //🔽med min kun rdzob tu yang med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya gnyi ga yod pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro // med min kun rdzob tu yang med pa ma yin te /
translated: because it is not tenable that both the object of knowledge and the consciousness that knows it exist.🔽It is not nonexistent, because it is not possible to deny the conventional.

original: kun rdzob la bsnyon gdab par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob la bsnyon gdab par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not both, because existence and nonexistence are mutually exclusive.

original: yod pa dang med pa'i bdag nyid kyis gnyi ga'i ngo bo yang ma yin te /🔽yod pa dang med pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽yod pa dang med pa las gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i bdag nyid kyis gnyi ga'i ngo bo yang ma yin te / yod pa dang med pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro // yod pa dang med pa las gnyi ga ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the nature of both, because of the contradiction between existence and nonexistence.🔽Nor is it the nature of neither, because of the contradiction between existence and nonexistence.

original: gnyis las phyi rol du gyur pa ma bsal ba'i rang bzhin mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis las phyi rol du gyur pa ma bsal ba'i rang bzhin mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it the nature of neither, because a nature that is not distinguished as being external to the two is not tenable.

original: 'o na de kho na ci yang ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de kho na ci yang ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well then, it would follow that reality is nothing at all.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pas stong pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pas stong pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it just that it is empty of existence, nonexistence, and so on?

original: de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ;
analyzed: de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ;
translated: The Bhagavān also said:

original: yod dang med ces gnyi ga mtha' //
analyzed: yod dang med ces gnyi ga mtha' //
translated: Existence and nonexistence are both extremes.

original: dag dang ma dag 'di yang mtha' //
analyzed: dag dang ma dag 'di yang mtha' //
translated: Purity and impurity are also extremes.

original: de phyir mtha' gnyis rnam spangs nas //
analyzed: de phyir mtha' gnyis rnam spangs nas //
translated: Therefore, having abandoned the two extremes,

original: mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas mi byed //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: mkhas pas dbus la'ang gnas mi byed // ces gsungs so //
translated: the wise do not abide even in the middle.

original: 'di ni gzhon nu ma len gyis //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhon nu ma len gyis //
translated: The youthful Mañjuśrī

original: de la rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams //
analyzed: de la rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams //
translated: The Yogācāras

original: don mthong rnam par shes la brten //
analyzed: don mthong rnam par shes la brten //
translated: The meaning is seen in dependence on consciousness.

original: gang dag dbu ma par smra rnams //
analyzed: gang dag dbu ma par smra rnams //
translated: Those who speak of the middle

original: de yang med par 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: de yang med par 'dod pa yin //
translated: also assert that it is nonexistent.

original: zhes gang smras pa de yang bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes gang smras pa de yang bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is also refuted.

original: gang gis 'di brjod pa mdzes par gyur pa dbu ma pa'i de kho na ni thams cad med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis 'di brjod pa mdzes par gyur pa dbu ma pa'i de kho na ni thams cad med pa ma yin te /
translated: The reality of the Madhyamaka, which is expressed in this way, is not nonexistent,

original: de dag med pa nyid du yang mi 'dod pa'i phyir te /🔽re zhig nyes pa @61a * //
analyzed: de dag med pa nyid du yang mi 'dod pa'i phyir te / re zhig nyes pa @61a * //
translated: because it is not asserted that those do not exist.🔽First, it is said:

original: thams cad kyis //🔽'byung gnas med pa bsal ba yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: thams cad kyis // 'byung gnas med pa bsal ba yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The source of all faults🔽is refuted as nonexistent.

original: yod pa bkag pa nyid kyis med par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa bkag pa nyid kyis med par 'dod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you assert that it is nonexistent because of the negation of existence,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: med pa ni yod pa sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa ni yod pa sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nonexistence is preceded by existence.

original: de ma grub na de yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽med pa yod pa'i zlas drangs te //
analyzed: de ma grub na de yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro // med pa yod pa'i zlas drangs te //
translated: If that is not established, this is not established.🔽Nonexistence is drawn out by existence,

original: yod pa med pa'i zlas drangs yin //
analyzed: yod pa med pa'i zlas drangs yin //
translated: and existence is drawn out by nonexistence.

original: de phyir med par mi brjod cing //
analyzed: de phyir med par mi brjod cing //
translated: Therefore, do not say that it is nonexistent,

original: yod par yang ni mi brtag go //
analyzed: yod par yang ni mi brtag go //
translated: and do not imagine that it exists.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is what the Transcendent Lord has said.

original: gzhan yang gal te dngos po med pa kho na yin na de yod par bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa gang brjod pa de la kho bo cag kyang smra ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te dngos po med pa kho na yin na de yod par bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa gang brjod pa de la kho bo cag kyang smra ste /
translated: Moreover, if it is only a non-thing, then how could the Transcendent Lord have said that it exists? Whatever is said, we also say that.

original: gal te dngos po yod pa kho na yin na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang bzhin med par gsungs /
analyzed: gal te dngos po yod pa kho na yin na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang bzhin med par gsungs /
translated: If it is only a thing, then how could the Transcendent Lord have said that it is essenceless?

original: 'o na 'dir de kho na gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'dir de kho na gang yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it here?

original: rang bzhin med pa kho na don dam pa pa yin zhing /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa kho na don dam pa pa yin zhing /
translated: It is only essencelessness that is ultimate.

original: khyad par du stong pa kho na mdo gzhan du de kho nar mgon pos bstan pa yin /
analyzed: khyad par du stong pa kho na mdo gzhan du de kho nar mgon pos bstan pa yin /
translated: In particular, emptiness alone is taught as reality in other sūtras by the Protector.

original: de kun rdzob pa yin yang mi 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de kun rdzob pa yin yang mi 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: It is not contradictory that it is conventional.

original: stong pa nyid du smra ba ni dngos po rnams kun rdzob tu yod pa yang mi bzod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du smra ba ni dngos po rnams kun rdzob tu yod pa yang mi bzod pa ma yin no //
translated: The proponent of emptiness does not deny that things exist conventionally.

original: des na yod par bstan pa 'di stong pa nyid don dam pa par 'thad pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan par mi rigs so //
analyzed: des na yod par bstan pa 'di stong pa nyid don dam pa par 'thad pa bsal ba'i phyir bstan par mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not right to teach that this teaching of existence is in order to eliminate the possibility of emptiness being ultimate.

original: thams cad don dam pa yin na stong pa nyid du bstan pa mi 'thad pas na nges par de la gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad don dam pa yin na stong pa nyid du bstan pa mi 'thad pas na nges par de la gnod pa yin no //
translated: If everything were ultimate, it would be untenable to teach emptiness. Therefore, it is definitely undermined.

original: des na stong pa nyid du bstan bstan pa gzhan gyis mi gnod pas na nges pa'i don yin pas tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: des na stong pa nyid du bstan bstan pa gzhan gyis mi gnod pas na nges pa'i don yin pas tshad ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, since the teaching of emptiness is not undermined by other teachings, it is of definitive meaning and is valid.

original: bstan pa gzhan ni bzlog pa yin pas tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa gzhan ni bzlog pa yin pas tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Other teachings are not valid because they are contradicted.

original: gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bstan pa ni tshad mas mi bslu ba dang ldan pa yin na de la de las bzlog pa'i ngo bo can gzhan gyis sel ba'am gegs byed par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bstan pa ni tshad mas mi bslu ba dang ldan pa yin na de la de las bzlog pa'i ngo bo can gzhan gyis sel ba'am gegs byed par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Moreover, if the teaching of the emptiness of all phenomena were undeceiving due to being valid, how could it be eliminated or obstructed by others with a different nature?

original: sel ba dang gegs byed pa med pa la ni drang ba'i don nyid du rtogs pa rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sel ba dang gegs byed pa med pa la ni drang ba'i don nyid du rtogs pa rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to understand that which is not eliminated or obstructed to be of provisional meaning.

original: stong pa nyid la tshad mas mi bslu ba mi srid pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la tshad mas mi bslu ba mi srid pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it impossible for emptiness to be undeceiving due to being valid?

original: sgrub byed gang gis stong pa nyid yin pa de yang stong pa'am mi stong pa zhig yin grang na /
analyzed: sgrub byed gang gis stong pa nyid yin pa de yang stong pa'am mi stong pa zhig yin grang na /
translated: If the proof of emptiness is itself empty or non-empty,

original: stong pa yin na de ni med pa kho na yin pas na /
analyzed: stong pa yin na de ni med pa kho na yin pas na /
translated: if it is empty, it is nonexistent,

original: ji ltar des stong pa nyid du 'grub /
analyzed: ji ltar des stong pa nyid du 'grub /
translated: so how could it establish emptiness?

original: ji ste stong pa ma yin na ni thams cad stong pa yin no zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don la gnod cing /
analyzed: ji ste stong pa ma yin na ni thams cad stong pa yin no zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i don la gnod cing /
translated: But if it is not empty, then the meaning of the thesis “all is empty” is undermined,

original: @61b de nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: @61b de nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyang ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: and the reason itself is indeterminate.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thams cad med ces smra ba gtan tshigs bcas pa'am //
analyzed: thams cad med ces smra ba gtan tshigs bcas pa'am //
translated: “All is nonexistent” is stated with a reason,

original: 'on te dam bca' rang nyid sgrub par byed dam ci //
analyzed: 'on te dam bca' rang nyid sgrub par byed dam ci //
translated: or else, does the thesis itself prove it?

original: ji ste gtan tshigs 'god pa g-yel bar gyur na ni //🔽dam bca' 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di la ci zhig 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ste gtan tshigs 'god pa g-yel bar gyur na ni // dam bca' 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di la ci zhig 'gyur //
translated: But if the statement of the reason is omitted,

original: zhes gsungs so zhe na /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so zhe na /
translated: what is the point of the thesis?

original: stong pa'i sgrub byed kho nas stong pa nyid bsgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: stong pa'i sgrub byed kho nas stong pa nyid bsgrub pa yin la /
translated: The proof of emptiness itself proves emptiness.

original: de lta yin yang sgrub par byed pa med par bsgrub bya sgrub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin yang sgrub par byed pa med par bsgrub bya sgrub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But even if that is so, the probandum is not established without a proof.

original: 'di ltar stong pa yin no zhes bya ba kho nas de kun rdzob tu yang med par ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar stong pa yin no zhes bya ba kho nas de kun rdzob tu yang med par ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not the case that “it is empty” alone is not even conventionally nonexistent.

original: stong pa las bsgrub bya grub pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: stong pa las bsgrub bya grub pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
translated: How does the probandum arise from the empty?

original: gnod sbyin ji 'dra ba gtor ma de 'dra'o zhes 'jig rten na grags pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod sbyin ji 'dra ba gtor ma de 'dra'o zhes 'jig rten na grags pa yin te /
translated: In the world, it is well known that “the offering cake is like the yakṣa.”

original: de skad du /🔽stong pa kho na'i chos rnams las //
analyzed: de skad du / stong pa kho na'i chos rnams las //
translated: Thus it is said:🔽From only empty phenomena

original: stong pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: stong pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba yin // zhes gsungs so //
translated: empty phenomena arise.

original: 'o na don dam par na sgrub byed med cing bsgrub pa yang med pas /
analyzed: 'o na don dam par na sgrub byed med cing bsgrub pa yang med pas /
translated: Well, if ultimately there is no proof and there is also no probandum,

original: don dam pa'i rang bzhin med pa sgrub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: don dam pa'i rang bzhin med pa sgrub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the ultimate naturelessness is not established.

original: skyon 'di ni med de gang gis de don dam par ma yin pa de yang de lta bur 'gyur ba sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba'i byed pa po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon 'di ni med de gang gis de don dam par ma yin pa de yang de lta bur 'gyur ba sgrub par byed pa bsgrub par bya ba'i byed pa po ni ma yin no //
translated: This fault does not exist, because that which is not ultimately is also like that. The proof is not the agent of the probandum.

original: gal te shes par byed pa don dam pa pa ma yin pa de lta na yang shes par bya ba yang de lta bu'i ngo bor ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te shes par byed pa don dam pa pa ma yin pa de lta na yang shes par bya ba yang de lta bu'i ngo bor ga la 'gyur /
translated: If the object of knowledge is not ultimate, how can the object of knowledge be of that nature?

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa las yang dag pa'i nges pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa las yang dag pa'i nges pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How can there be a true ascertainment from what is not true?

original: nges pa ni yang dag pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang yang dag par ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa ni yang dag pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang yang dag par ma yin no //
translated: Ascertainment is not true, but neither is it not true.
